sprul pa mang po rgya mtsho'i tshogs chen gyis// bya med don las rdul tsam bskyod mi nus// zhi la phra ste

mngon du rnyed pa dka' 'o// rtog ge spyod yul 'khrul las shes mi nus// bskyod dang mi bskyod rtog pa med pa ni// mtshan nyid nam mkha' las kyang 'das pa'o// ye nas lhun gyis grub pa'i thabs chen la// rgyu bcos rtog pas grub par mi 'gyur te// spyod pa'i sgo dang mtha' las 'das pa la// log rtog 'khrul pas bsrung du ga la yod// mtshan nyid med pa'i thig le chen po ni// sprul pa sgyu ma tsam du snang ba yang// chos nyid dbyings las dbye bsal mi 'jug pas// sgyu ma'i lam du rgyal bas yongs ma bsngags// mi gnas chos sku brjod las 'das pa ni// dbu ma tsam du'ang ye nas mi gnas pas// de bzhin bde ba'i ye shes mtha' klags kyang// snang dang brjod pa'i mtha' las 'das pa'o// byang chub sems nam mkha'i rgyal po rdzogs so//// rgya gar skad du/ many+dzu su kha/ bod skad du/ bde 'jam/ bcom ldan 'das rdo rje bde ba chen po la phyag 'tshal lo// bde 'jam dbyings phyug sdug bsngal b+ha ga la// dbyer med lhun rdzogs thig la dbying nyid che// bskyod pa mi mnga' ye nas rin po che// bya ba med par lhun rdzogs thig le che// thams cad ma bkag dbyer med bdag nyid che// skye med dbyings las thams cad 'gags shing// dus gsum 'du 'bral med pa'i gsal ba yang// don dam klong du gyur pas sems dpa' che// rgyu las bsgrub tu med pas ye nas gnas// btsal du med pas bod pa mngon sum dbyings// smon du med pas thams cad rang la rdzogs// tha snyad med pas rnal 'byor chen po'i bdag/ go 'phang med pas lta ba kun gyi dbyings// 'dul ba'i las rnams thams cad ci spyad kyang// rol pa nyid las mnyams shin tu bde// thig le nyid pas spang du med pa'i phyir// rtsa ba'i 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug kyang// spang du med pas byang chub chen po'i lam// bsam du med pa'i ye shes gsal pa ni// rnam grangs med pas dbying nyid bdag po'i klong// gzugs rnams med pas byang chub snying po'i sku// rnam rtog zhi bas khyad par ye shes che// gdod nas ma bskyed pa ni dngos grub ste// 'chi ba med pas bdud rtsi'i dbyings// thig le ye nas gsal ba'i dam tshig la// tha tshig ming du btags pa med// ri rab rtse nas nyi ma stong shar bas// ye shes thugs kyi nyi ma gcig shar dro// rang la thams cad shar ba'i 'od zer ni// shar ba nyid na dus gsum nub pa med// mi gnas dmigs su med pas gsal ba ni// bsgom du med nyid bsgom du med pas bde// ye nas ma bsgoms ji bzhin gsal ba yang// bsgoms pas gzhan nas rgyal ba'i chos mi rnyed// rdo rje nyi ma dbyings nas shar ba yis// thams cad kun kyang de bzhin nyid du

gsal// 'gyur ba med pas lta ba bal nag ste// cir yang 'gyur bas thugs rje bal dkar bzhin// brtags na thams cad bal nag nyid kyi dbyings// lhun gyi gnas pas lta ba'i go 'phang gcod// gdod nas dag pas srid pa'i pad+ma bzhin// 'gyur ba med pas thig le'i dbyings na bde// bya ba med pas thams cad kun la 'jam// dus gsum med pas thig le nyid du 'byam// ye nas snying po btsal du med pa la// btsal ba'i bsam pas don dam dbyings mi bskyod// dra ba nyid pas mu khyud phyogs bcur bde// thig le nyid pas thig phran dgu la bde// rtse rgyal rtogs na grub pa'i gnas chen bde// thig le ye nas bde ba'i rdo rje'i dbyings// thogs med yongs su sbyang pa'i b+ha ga la// dbyer med lhun rdzogs thig le dbyings nyid che// sku gsung thugs shar mu khyud dkyil 'khor bde// rnam par dag pas bde ba'i byang chub sku// 'gro pa'i lam chen mkha' dbyings dag pa la// thig le ye nas bde ba rdo rje'i dbyings// rdo rje nyi ma dus gsum 'du 'bral med// de bas thig le thams cad rdo rje'i dbyings// brdal pa nyid na dus gsum 'du 'bral med// byang chub sems ni ye nas gsal ba'i phyir// klong gi dkyil 'khor chen po bde 'jam rdzogs so//// rgya gar skad du/ sarba a ta/ bod skad du/ kun 'dus/ bcom ldan 'das bya bral bde ba'i ngang la phyag 'tshal lo// chos sku ye nas rnam par rab dben pa'i// rnam rtog bla dgas yul las 'das pa'i phyir// yod med stong pa'i mtha' ni dbyings su gcig/ dbyings nyid gcig la lta ba'i khyad par dgur snang ste// snang 'dod rtsol ba'i sems ni sdug bsngal nad// chos nyid dang gi gnas pa'i rang bzhin las// thugs rje chen po'i mkha' ltar khyab pa ni// thabs kyis rol pas 'dod dgur bsgyur ba'i dpal// chos rnams sna tshogs ji bzhin snang ba las// tha snyad thams cad byang chub mchog gi lam// snying po byang chub mchog tu nges pa las// gzung 'dzin bgrod pa'i yul ni ga la yod// tha snyad tsam du 'du shes bya mod kyi// dam du bcas pa'i yul yang rdul tsam med// dam du bcas pa'i yul med gsal ba na// dam du bcas kyang yul med nam mkha' 'dra// 'dod dgur sgyur ba'i snying rje thabs chen la// bsam dgu lhun gyis grub par byed pa yang// ye shes klong du shar ba'i rnal 'byor pas// sa mchog 'di ni ma bsgrubs lhun gyis grub// bag la nyal ba'i skyon rnams ma lus kun// ye shes 'od gsal rang la shar ba'i phyir// theg chen 'di ni mkha' la nyi shar bzhin// mtha' yi mun pa med par ye nas gsal// sgom

pa'i yul la 'dzin pa'i gnas med pas// sgom bcas de dag 'dzin pa'i sdug bsngal yin// sgom pa'i gnas med rig ba rang dbang na// bsgoms kyang skyon med thams cad nam mkha'i klong// gang yang ma bkol kun gyi re ba klong// mnyam pa nyid kyi man ngag gter chen gyis// kun la khyab cing thams cad rang rdzogs// de la cha shas rim pas bza' ba med// ye nas bdud rtsi chen po yin pa la// gzhan nas btsal bas 'grub par mi 'gyur zhing// ma btsal lhun gyis grub pa'i dbyings 'gyur la// rnam pa kun tu che bas byang chub lam// thams cad dgongs spyod ye nas dag pa la// 'khrul dang ma 'khrul cis kyang nyams pa med// thams cad 'dus te cir yang mi snang bas// dus gsum rgyal ba'i dgongs pa de na gsal// byang chub kyi sems kun 'dus rdzogs so//// bcom ldan 'das rdo rje bskal pa'i bdag po la phyag 'tshal lo// srid bar bcas pa'i 'jigs rten dang// thugs rjer bcas pa'i pho brang kun// sprul pa'i 'khor lo 'od 'bar ba'ang// mngon sum sangs rgyas mkha' la shar// phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten mang po nas// spyan drangs la sogs rtsol ba'i gnad// bde ba gsal ba'i thig le las// sangs rgyas gzhan du mi rtsol lo// sems dang chos las sangs rgyas gzhan na med// mnyam nyid nam mkha' lta bu'i rang bzhin las// sna tshogs mtshan ma rdul du brlag ba'i phyir// phyag rgya'i tshogs kyang bskal pa'i me ltar 'bar// ye nas lhun gyis grub pa'i rang bzhin las// rtsol ba'i sdug bsngal rgya mtsho'i rlabs dang 'dra// chos so cog gi ngo bo nyid// ma btsal gzhag pas rdul du brlag/ thams cad bdag nyid rang gi lha// dkyil 'khor kun tu zhugs pa la// dus gsum mnyam sbyor 'byung 'jug med// ma btsal lhun gyis grub par 'gyur// phyi nang spyod yul ma lus pa// mnyam dag lhun gyis grub pa la// dus gsum mnyam par gzhag pa ni// bcing du med pa'i phyag rgya yin// mi phyed thig ler gcig pa la// dus gsum 'byung 'jug med pa ni// sangs rgyas kun dang mnyam pa'i phyir// bsrung du med pa'i dam tshig mchog/ khams gsum ngo bo rang rig dbyings// phyogs bcu rgya dang bral ba yi// bcos pa med pa'i 'khor lo la// ma bkod shar ba'i dkyil 'khor mchog/ thams cad mngon sum shar ba yang// byin rlabs mthu la mi ltos par// yid bzhin lhun gyis grub pa ni// bsngo dang bral bas mchod pa'i mchog/ rtog pa'i rgyal mtshan shar ba'i phyir// thams cad ngo bo bdag nyid sku// don la rim pas mi 'grub pas// thog pa med pa dbang gi mchog/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten rab

'byams na// g.yo zhing bskyod pa'i chos rnams kun// rang byung sbrul pa bsam yas kyis// bya byed med pa'i 'phrin las phul// mi dmigs byams pa chen po ste// mtha' yas thugs rje chen po yin// rab 'byams bde la dga' ba ste// stong nyid gsal ba btang snyoms so// gsang sngags chen po'i khyad par ni// rang rig rgyal ba'i thugs rje yis// bag chags rdul du rlog pa dang// mtshan ma zil gyis gnon pa ni// khyud chen mkha' la thogs med pas// steng 'og rim gyis mi bgros de// snang ba dus gcig gsal ba ni// skye 'gro 'dul ba'i gnyen po yin// seng ge'i skad la 'jigs med pa// gcan gzan rim gyis mi 'dul te// gzhan gyis rtsol pas mi chud pas// dud 'gro 'dul ba'i gnyen po yin// rang bzhin gsal ba'i byang chub sems// rgyu 'bras rim gyis mi bgrod de// bde chen mkha' la thogs med pas// rnam rtog sgrol ba'i gnyen po yin// byang chub sems mi 'gyur ba'i rdo rje thugs rje chen po'i 'od/ gnam spar 'debs rdzogs so//// bcom ldan 'das bde chen rdzogs pa'i klong la phyag 'tshal lo// byang chub sems ni kun tu bzang// bdag dang gzhan don gnas med pas/ lhun gyi rdzogs pa'i ngang nyid la// skye dang 'chi med 'gyur ba'i chos med do// dag pas bdud rtsi chen po yang// mi 'gyur gsal bas gser gzhin te// dge sdig so sor bcings pa yis// rnam grol thar pa bcings pa ha// gang gis de ltar ma rig ste// don med sgra phyir 'brangs pa yang// dge sdig gnyis ka'i phyogs 'dzin pas// dmigs med ldongs nas 'gro ba ha// dkar bas dkar ba'i nyi ma med// gnag pas gnag pa'i mun pa med// zhi bas gsal ba'i thig le la// lhag pa'i lha yang yod ma yin// mu med brdal bar gnas pa'i phyir// thams cad du ni gcig pu nyid// nam mkha' lta bu'i bdag nyid la// sems can med cing sangs rgyas med// rig pa med cing sangs rgyas med// bri ba med cing 'phel ba med// dus gsum thig le bde ba'i phyir// su la phan med gnod mi 'gyur// rnam par dag pa'i snying po la// mngon sum lhun gyi grub pa ha// mi snang 'gyur ba med pa ni// shes rab thabs las 'das pa'i phyir// lam dang byang chub dang med pa ste// med pa'i snying po shar ba ha// skal ldan gang zhig 'byung ba yi// don du gsungs pa'i dgongs spyod kyang// 'di don gdengs dang ldan pa yis// gang ltar spyad kya nga me tog skye// yang dag nges pa'i lung 'di yang// rang rig klong du khrol 'dod pas// sems kyi klong du brnag pa las// phal la spro bar mi bya'o// rdzogs pa'i spyi gcod ces bya ba rdzogs so////

bcom ldan 'das dpal kun tu bzang po la phyag 'tshal lo// khams gsum las 'das yid bzhin nor bu rin po che// bgrod med rnam par grol ba'i lam ston pa// gzhan nas btsal bar rnyed par mi 'gyur te// thig le chen po kun la khyab par gnas// rang byung ye shes ma bcos 'od gsal ba// bde chen btsal du med pas snying po'i don// snang mdzad nyid ni rtag par kun tu bzang// gnyis med bde ba'i ngang ste lhun gyis grub// g.yung drung chen po'i klong du shar ba yis// bde ba chen po'i longs spyod rdzogs pa yang// rtog dpyod mtshan ma kun las 'das pa'i phyir// drang srong chen po nyid kyi spyod yul yin// thams cad sku gsung thugs kyi dkyil 'khor la// shes te rtog pa'i klong du mnyam gzhag nas// grub pa'i khyad par mngon du shar ba'i tshe// khams gsum kun kyang bdag gi zhabs la 'dud// byang chub kyi sems khams gsum sgron ma rdzogs so////

rdo rje sems dpa' nam mkha' dang mnyam pa'i rgyud bzhugs so// rje sems dpa' nam mkha' mtha' dang mnyam pa'i rgyud le'u nyer bdun yan chad sde dge dang 'dra/ nyer brgyad man chad sde dge'i rgyud 'bum du mi bzhugs pa mtshams brag rgyud 'bum nas kha bskangs ba/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rang bzhin gcig dang du ma las 'das pa'i bdag nyid/ snying po rang byung rig pa'i sku/ dpal rdo rje sems dpa' de kho na nyid la dgongs te ci yang mi gsung bar bzhugs so// de nas de'i tshe 'khor mang po de ltar gyur pa mthong zhing rig nas/ sems dpa' rdo rje la 'di skad ces gsol ba btab bo// dus gsum sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// gsang ba'i 'khor lo gter gyi bdag/ rang byung rig pa mchog gi sku// rmad byung rol pa'i bdag po khyod// rgyal ba'i thugs dang dbyer

med phyir// gang du'ang rig par dka' ba yi// gsang ba'i don ni gsol ba 'debs// e maho shin tu rtogs par dka'// e maho rnyog pa bral ba'i don// e maho kun gyi yum yin pa// e maho dri med rgyud 'di gsungs// rdo rje zhes pa ji lta bu// sems dpa' zhes pa gang gi don// nam mkha' zhes pa ji ltar brjod// de yi mtha' mnyam ji lta bu// rgyud ces ji ltar brjod par bya// bdag cag rnams la bshad du gsol// zhes zhus so// de nas sems dpa' rdo rjes/ rol ba rang snang gi 'khor la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rdo rje zhes su bstan pa ni// rang bzhin rtog dang mthar phyin pa'i// thugs kyi rig pa bstan pa nyid// rang byung rig pa'i snying po nyid// thams cad 'dus pa'i rdo rje ste// mi phyed rkyen dang bral ba'i phyir// rang byung rdo rje snying por gnas// 'di ni gnas pa gsum yin te// rkyen dang bral bas mi snang ngo// lhun grub rang byung mi phyed pa// bstan pa thugs kyi rdo rje ste// dgu rum sbas pa thugs kyi gter// ma lus rdo rje byin rlabs pas// ye shes snang ba phyogs ris med// mtha' bral nam mkha'i snying po ltar// gsal ba dri ma'i rnyog pa med// skyes bu'i thugs kyi dkyil 'khor nyid// rgyal ba kun gyi thugs nyid ni// thog ma tha ma med pa yi// rang byung 'du 'bral med pa nyid// phyogs bcu mtha' dbus bral ba yi// nam mkha' yangs pa'i dkyil 'khor ltar// gnang bkag med pa'i rang bzhin nyid// mthar phyin ye shes rdo rje nyid// ma bcos pa dang rtog pa dang// phyogs bral mnyam pa'i snying po ste// sangs rgyas dang ni sems can dang// phyi nang snod bcud ma lus pa// rang byung snying por gcig pa yi// rang byung ye shes ma bcos pa'i// 'gro ba'i rgyud la gnas pa ste// gnas pa don gyi gzhi zhes bstan// lhun grub gsum du gnas pa nyid// kun dang 'brel ba'i thabs chen po// rna brgyud dgongs pas byin rlabs nas// thugs kyi dkyil 'khor mngon bstan nas// shes bya'i chos rnams thams cad kun// ma bcos shes bya nyid du gsal// gang du phyogs ris med pa yi// rang byung rig pa'i snying po nyid// rang bzhin

mtshan nyid rol pa ste// phyogs med nam mkha'i rang bzhin ltar// kun 'dus me long gsal bar bstan// rig pa'i dong rtse gsal ba nyid// phyogs med nyi ma'i snying po ltar// rang byung rdzogs pa'i ma bcos pa// gnas nyid rtogs te mthar phyin pa'o// 'di nyid nam mkha' gsum nyid de// snang srid dang ni kun brtags dang// ma bcos pa zhes bstan pa nyid// snang ba dang ni srid pa dang// ji snyed ma lus thams cad ni// rang byung rig pa mkhar snang ste// rgyu rkyen 'das pa'i rang byung nyid// khyab cing mtshon pa'i yul las 'das// rang rang zhen pas gang brtags pa'i// blo dang rgyu rkyen las byung ba// bsam dang rgyu ba'i sbyor ba can// rang gi blo yis spyad brtags pa// 'di dag kun brtags nam mkhar bshad// rang bzhin khyab pa'i yul las 'das// rang byung rtogs pas tshad dang bral// gang dang gang gis ma bcos pa// rgyu ba'i yul dang bral ba ste// dran rig nam mkha' blta bya ste// ma bcos gsal ba'i dbang po la// rig pa'i dong tshe rtogs par gnas// mkha' ltar dri med ma bcos pa// rtogs pas mi gzung yid du khyer// dus gsum ma bcos gnyug ma'i don// shes nas ma bcos snying po'i don// rig pa tshad bral 'od du 'bar// ma bcos rig pa snying po'i sems// sgo gsum bcos pa'i bar ma lus// rang bzhin rtogs pa ye shes nyid// mtha' dbus phyogs ris med pa'i don// ma lus don gyi snying po 'di// sangs rgyas sems can gnyis med pa'i// gdod nas snying por 'khyil ba'i dbyings// bya bsam brtag pa'i yul las 'das// mtha' bral dbu ma chen po la// dgag dang bsgrub pa'i chos med pas// ma lus snying por gsal rtogs pas// don lam rin chen dpe bzhi ltar// phyogs ris med cing rgya mnyam pas// nam mkha'i mtha' dang mnyam pa'o// gdod nas mtha' bral chen po la// dgongs pa'i lung gis mtshams sbyar nas// mtha' bral nam mkha'i dkyil 'khor ltar// mtha' dbus med pa'i de bzhin nyid// rang byung ye shes thog mtha' med// re dogs spangs pas rgyu ba zad// ma lus ma 'gags ye shes ni// phyogs ris med par shar ba'o// 'di la mtha' dbus med pa dang// phyogs ris med par bsam 'das pas// nam mkha'i mtha' dang mnyam pa ste// bsam med nam mkha'i klong chen po// rgyud ces bya ba rgyun du grags// ma bral snying po bde ba'i klong// rang bzhin ye shes mnyam nyid la// bar chad med pa'i rnal 'byor de// sku gsung dgongs pa mtha' bral nyid// nam mkha' lta bur rtag tu gnas// 'di la thams cad lhun grub pas// snang srid rdzogs pa chen po'i rgyud// de la rgyud kyi snying po'o// zhes gsungs so// nam mkha'i

mtha' dang mnyam pa'i rgyud chen po las// rgyud kyi mtshan pa'i le'u ste nyi shu brgyad pa'o//// de nas yang rang snang rol ba'i 'khor tshogs kyis// sems dpa' rdo rje la 'di skad ces gsol to// kye ma'o sems dpa' rdo rje khyod// sangs rgyas kun gyi rang bzhin te// sku gsung thugs ni bsam mi khyab// mgon po khyod la gsol ba ni// sgro skur med par ji ltar lags// bshad pa nyid kyang ji lta bu// dus ni ji ltar gcig pa lags// 'og min gnas kyang ji lta bu// rang bzhin dang ni lta ba dang// mngon du gyur pa ji lta bu// gleng gzhi zhes pa ji ltar lags// rgyal ba so sor snang ba de// tha dad pa ni ma yin nam// thun mong rgyud dang khyad par ci// rang byung snying po lhun grub la// sgro dang skur pa kun bral ba// ma bcos rin chen 'khor lo'i thugs// 'od gsal snying po 'gyur ba med// sgro 'dogs skur 'debs mtshan ma'i lam// gsang ba'i thabs kyis bcad nas ni// gzhi gzhag rang lugs ma bcos par// snying po rig pa mngon du bstan// ji ltar chu la chu gzhag ltar// bde bar gnas pas pha rol phyin// snying po gcig tu kun rdzogs pas// sgro 'dogs skur 'debs gdod nas med// gang gis gang la gang dus su// gang bshad pa nyid de bzhin te// ma lus pa yi de bzhin nyid// snying po rang byung rdzogs pa'i bdag/ ma lus 'chang bdag snying po ste// lhun rdzogs rgyal ba kun gyi ngang// sna tshogs rang snang rig pa'i 'khor// rol pa 'bum phrag mtha' las 'das// rang byung rig pa kun 'char la// tha dad ston 'khor khyad par med// bsam gyis mi khyab pa yi dus// snga phyi med pa'i dus gcig ste// dus gcig rtogs pas dus kun rtogs// dus dang rtog pa gcig tu bstan// rang byung 'od gsal 'khor lo'i thugs// sgro skur dag pa'i bde chen po// mkha' ltar bsam pa'i yul las 'das// rgyu 'bras lhun rdzogs snying po la// bstan pa ma lus kun 'dus pas// dus gcig dgongs pa mkha' ltar bshad/ ston pa gnas 'khor dus bstan pa// rang byung rol pa mchog nyid las// ro dang rnam pa ji bzhin pas// khyad par med de snying por rdzogs// ji snyed pa yi chos rnams kun// rin chen 'od la kun rdzogs pas// gdod nas skye 'gag gnas pa med// snying po rdzogs pa gcig ste gnas// gdod nas gcig pa'i rang bzhin la// dus gsum gcig par mngon bstan pas// phyogs bcu mtha' dbus chos thams cad// dus gcig phyogs ris med par rtogs// gang du zhen pas brtag pa yi// bgrangs dang bsgom dang brtag pa dag/ rang rang brtags pas snang ba ste// de dag dus gcig sbyor zad de// re dogs chad pa'i snying po nyid// ma bgrod rtogs pas

phyin pa'i gnas// rig pa'i gnas su rtogs pas phyin// ma lus rig pa'i 'og min gnas// sangs rgyas kun gyi pho brang nyid// thig le steng 'og phyogs cha med// 'og min gnas zhes brjod pa yin// rang byung snying po kun gyi rgyu// rgyu lnga 'bras bu gsum la sogs// phyogs bcu nam mkha'i mthar thug pa// 'di la 'dus pa'i 'khor du bshad// ma lus snying por dag pa la// dngos dang blo yi khyad par gyis// rang rang phyogs kyis gang bltas pa// 'di la 'das pas 'khor du bshad// ji ltar gnas pa'i don de nyid// rtogs nas 'bras bu lhun grub pa// ji snyed sangs rgyas thams cad kyang// 'di las 'byung bas ston pa'o// don dang tshig gi gleng gzhi ni// ji snyed sangs rgyas thams cad dang// bka' rgyud ma lus thams cad kyi// gleng brjod kun gyi gzhi yin pas// ma bcos don gyi gleng gzhi yin// bka' rgyud brjod bya thams cad kyi// 'byung ba'i rgyu dang gzhi nyid ni// phun sum tshogs pa'i bdag nyid de// gleng brjod 'byung phyir gleng gzhi nyid// rang byung snying po 'od gsal ba// rin chen bsam pa lhun grub rdzogs// gleng brjod ma lus kun 'char bas// gleng gzhi kun gyi ngo bor bshad// sangs rgyas kun gyi rang bzhin te// ma lus 'dus pa'i snying po bas// zhing khams mdzad pa ye shes dag/ gdul bya'i bsam pa'i tha dad pas// rin chen bzhi dang yon tan ltar// so so'i khyad par gang snang ba// tha dad snang ba yod ma yin// ma bcos snying po nyid la rdzogs// rang byung rol pa rang snang la// rgyu 'bras zhen pa mi gnas pas// rang snang phun sum tshogs par bshad// snying po 'od ltar rdzogs pa yin// rgyu 'bras zhen pa'i tha dad dag/ rang bzhin bsam pa phyin ci log/ de dag gang ltar ci snang ba// khyad par rig pa rang snang yin// zhes gsungs so// nam mkha'i mtha' dang mnyam pa'i rgyud chen po las gleng gzhi bshad pa'i le'u ste nyi shu dgu pa'o//// de nas yang rang snang rol ba'i 'khor tshogs kyis/ sems dpa' rdo rje la 'di skad ces gsol to// dus gsum rgyal ba thams cad kyi// sku gsung thugs kyi gter gyi dbyig/ rig pa'i bstan pa rdzogs pa'i bdag/ ma bcos rol par shar ba nyid// gzhi nyid ci phyir bshad pa ste// 'jug pa'i lam tshul ji lta bu// 'bras bu'i tshul ni ji ltar gnas// bdag cag rnams la legs par gsungs// zhes zhus so// de nas sems dpa' rdo rjes 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// 'dus pa'i tshogs chen da nyon cig/ gnas dang rtogs par bstan pa nyid// ma bcos sems kyi rang bzhin ni// rig pa 'od gsal stong pa nyid// sangs rgyas sems can gnyis med de// ma rig ye shes tha dad

med// rang byung rig pa'i snying po nyid// 'od gsal lhun rdzogs rin chen la// rang snang rol pa'i 'od 'char ba// phyogs med 'dod pa kun gzhi ste// ma bcos gnyug ma'i rang bzhin ni// rig pa'i 'od gsal stong pa nyid// phyogs ris bral ba'i snying po ste// dbye zhing tha dad chos dang bral// mtha' bral nam mkha' rang bzhin ltar// rang byung rig pa mu mtha' med// nam mkha'i mtha' dang mnyam sbyor ba// sangs rgyas sems can kun gyi gnas// nam mkha' lta bur kun la khyab// ma lus kun gyi snying po ste// gsang ba'i rang bzhin mtha' dbus med// rang byung dri med snying po ltar// gzhi gzhag rang lugs gsal ba'i 'od// phyogs cha med par gsal bar 'phro// ma lus don gyi snying po la// brda dang tha snyad byin rlabs kyis// ma lus rig pa'i snying por bstim// de nyid stong pa'i snying po ste// rang byung bde ba'i byin rlabs can// bde ba chen po'i snying po 'di// spyi gtsug gsal ba'i yon tan ltar// ma btsal yon tan lhun rdzogs kyang// thabs dang rna brgyud gter chad pas// rang la rdzogs kyang mthong ba med// gnas pa don gyi gzhi rdzogs kyang// rig pa'i tshad ma ma skyes shing// rtogs pa don gyi gzhi med na// 'khor ba'i lam ltar thar mi 'gyur// rang byung gsal ba'i snying po 'di// ma lus khyab par gnas gyur pa// rna brgyud dgongs pas byin rlabs shing// rig pa'i tshad mas don mthong na// lung dang rig pa la sogs pa// brda dang tha snyad rnams mi dgos// rang gi mtshan nyid ma rtogs na// spyi yi mtshan nyid la zhen pa// nyams dang bral ba'i rna brgyud ltar// re dogs chad par ga la 'gyur// dri med snying po'i don rtogs nas// lhun grub phyogs ris med par gsal// ma bcos rang gzhag mthar phyin pa// rtogs pa don gyi gzhi zhes bshad// ma lus 'byung zhing 'du ba'i phyir// gzhi nyid legs par bshad pa yin// lam gyi rang bzhin bstan pa ni// don dang tshig gis phye ba ste// bstan bya don gyi snying po nyid// rang byung mi 'gyur tshad ma ste// tshad ma kun gyi snying po nyid// ngo bo la sogs brgyad kyi don// ma bcos rang byung snying po ni// rang bzhin gcig tu gnas pa ste// rnam pa cis kyang ngos gzung med// mtshan nyid ye shes gsal ba ste// ngo bo mi 'gyur de bzhin nyid// skye dang bltos pa'i rgyu med pas// ma skyes 'jig pa ga la yod// rin chen yon tan ji bzhin du// yongs rdzogs gsal byed tshul gyis gnas// skyes pa'i rkyen dang bgrod pa dang// smin dang grub dang 'jig pa dang// rtags dang tha dad rkyen bral bas// rgyu rkyen rdo rje nyid la rdzogs// rgya mtsho 'du ba'i snying po ltar// bsdu dang gnas dang 'byung ba dang// rdzogs pa'i don nyid gang yin

pa// de nyid nges pa'i tshig tu bshad// gzhi dang lam dang 'bras bu dang// gnas skabs so so gang yin pa// mtshon pa dpe yi tshul yin pas// gang ltar sbyar ba de dag nyid// rang byung snying po'i mtshan nyid ni// ci yang yin no rnam kun bcas// spong len dgag bsgrub la sogs pa'i// phyogs mtshams nges pa'i chos ma yin// rang byung snying po tshad bral yang// dag pa'i tshad dang gsal ba'i tshad// rol pa phra ba khyab pa'i tshad// tshad med pa nyid tshad yin no// thabs chen bya bral mkha' khyab sems// thabs dang gzhi dang 'bras bu ste// rig pa rtogs pa ye shes nyid// bya bral rdzogs pa'i lung yin no// don lam mtshon pa'i nyams myong ste// rnyog dang 'byed dang dwangs pa ste// dus gsum nyid du bstan pa yin// tshogs dang nam mkha' rdo rje dang// 'gro 'dul thabs su bshad pa nyid// 'byed dang grol dang 'byin pa nyid// mos dang rtogs dang gdeng du gyur// brjod dang rtogs dang goms pa nyid// brjod dang rig pa chos nyid sgra// brda dang grol dang gar gzhag pa// de nyid bde ba chen po'i sems// rang rig rnyog pa bral ba'i sems// mtha' dbus re dogs zhen pa med// gang ltar gang yang 'gro 'ong med// ma bgrod rtogs pas dus gcig sa// phyogs ris med par rtogs pa'i sems// ma bcos don la 'jug pas lam// tshig lam rkyen gyis ma mtshon na// dgu rum sbas pa'i don mi gsal// brda dang dgongs pa'i gtan tshigs la// rna brgyud don dang 'brel ba'i tshig/ ma lus nges pa'i don du mtshon// de dag tshig lam don yin no// bgrod dang bskyed dang smin pa'i chos// btsal dang bsgrubs pa'i 'bras bu min// skye dang 'jig pa'i 'bras bu yin// thob bya gzhan ldan 'bras bu smin// rang byung lhun rdzogs 'bras bu ni// rang nyid rol pa mtha' yas las// nyid las gzhan pa'i thob bya med// rin chen yongs rdzogs yon tan ltar// rang snang che ba rgyun mi 'chad// ces gsungs so// nam mkha'i mtha' dang mnyam pa'i rgyud chen po las// rang byung ye shes rang shar bshad pa'i le'u ste sum cu pa'o//// de nas yang rig pa rang snang rol pa'i 'khor tshogs kyis// sems dpa' rdo rje la 'di skad ces gsol to// sangs rgyas kun gyi snying po che// 'khor lo dgongs pa klong brdal ji ltar lags// man ngag zhal chems ji ltar sprugs// sel med klong dgu ji ltar lags// rang byung rol pa rang shar ba// mkha' la gza' skar ji ltar bkram// mkha' khyab sems lung spyi don lnga// de dag ji ltar brjod pa yin// phun sum tshogs pa ji ltar bshad// bdag cag rnams la bshad du gsol// zhes gsol to// de nas bcom ldan 'das sems

dpa' rdo rjes 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// 'dus pa'i tshogs chen da nyon cig/ ji ltar snang ba'i chos rnams dang// rig pa dran rtog sna tshogs dang// rgyal ba kun gyi dgongs pa nyid// tha dad med pa'i byang chub sems// ma lus chos rnams rang bzhin ni// ma bcos byang chub sems las shar// ma lus chos kun snying po ste// phyogs ris med pa nam mkha'i klong// rang bzhin klong brdal phyogs ris med// ma bcos don gyi snying po la// ji bzhin rig pa'i tshad ma yin// ma lus chu dang chu bur dang// rgya mtsho'i rba rlabs ri mo ltar// ji ltar snang yang rang la thug/ sna tshogs byung yang nyid du grol// phyogs su med par gang rtogs pa// rtogs pa klong brdal phyogs ris med// rtogs pa bar chad med pa yis// phyogs med nam mkha'i rang bzhin la// phyogs kyi rten dang g.yogs med ltar// sna tshogs bye brag cha shas dang// dus gsum ltos pa bral ba'i yid// chu klung lta bur gcig tu gsal// ma lus 'dus pa'i snying po bas// gcig nyid kun gyi rang bzhin pas// dgongs pa klong brdal bshad pa'o// thabs chen ma bcos gsang ba'i don// gang zag blo yi khyad par nyid// 'phrul tshogs sgra yis gang brtags nas// bya ba sngon du bya ba kun// rim pa cho ga kun byas nas// mos dang blo yi rim pa bzhin// bcos ma'i rnal ma'i 'byor ba nyid// rna brgyud gsang ba'i gdams pa bzhin// gnas pa rtog nas bstan phyir sbyin// ma hA de ba'i gdams pa bzhin// rigs las rtogs bzhin du min// ji snyed brda don dgrol ba kun// 'khor ba rang sar grol ba'i phyir// gang du'ang bstan yang de nyid yin// man ngag zhal chems sprugs pa ste// klong dgu bstan pa spyi yi lung// bstan pa klong pa dgu'i ngo bo ni// lta ba phyogs ris med pa'i klong// spyod pa snang bkag med pa'i rgyan// ma bkod rol pa'i dkyil 'khor nyid// bkur thob med pa rdzogs pa'i klong// bsrung bral rig pa'i dam tshig nyid// bya btsal bral ba'i 'phrin las klong// sbyang bgrod med pa'i sa dang lam// sgrib pa med pa'i ye shes la// lhun grub 'bras bu rang bzhin gsal// rdzogs chen bstan pa ma lus pa'i// bka' rgyud spyi yi lde mig ste// de nyid byang chub sems su 'dus// ji snyed gang dang gang gsal ba// de dag 'di ru rdzogs par bstan// 'di ni rin chen klong dgus te// rdzogs chen bka' brgyud thams cad kyi// bsdus pa'i don du bstan pa yin// gzhan yang ma bcos snying po nyid// ma lus rdzogs pa'i rin po che// stong nyid snying por kun 'dus la// rnam pa'i rang bzhin bsam mi khyab// gzhi dang lam dang 'bras bu dang// sku dang gsung thugs rin po che// dkyil 'khor thig le che ba rnams// ji

snyed rnam grangs spros pa rnams// brjod dang bstan pa'i rnam grangs kun// ma 'dres yongs rdzogs snying po ste// stong nyid ma bcos snying po las// rig pa sna tshogs rang shar ba// stong nyid nam mkha'i klong chen las// mkha' la gza' skar bkram pa bzhin// rdzogs chen bka' rgyud ma lus pa// bstan pa chad pa'i yan lag yin// bstan pa sems nyid rin po che// ma lus 'byung ba'i rgyu nyid ni// ma bcos sems nyid rang bzhin dang// rig pa sems kyi ngo bo dang// thugs rje brdal ba'i ngo bo nyid// ma bcos sems kyi rang bzhin ni// skye med chos sku'i mtshan nyid ni// ngo bo mtshan nyid lhun grub ba// gnyis med longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku// thugs rje rnam pa lhun grub pa// sprul sku phyogs ris med par sar// de nyid rgyu dang 'brel ba dang// 'bras bu rim pa ma yin par// de dag 'chad pa'i ston pa dang// rmad byung pho brang gnas nyid dang// rim par 'dus pa'i 'khor tshogs dang// bstan pa bshad pa'i dus dang ni// ma nor sdud par 'dzin pa dang// bstan pa'i khyad par 'tsham pa bzhin// rang byung phun sum tshogs pa ste// rnam pa bco brgyad bstan pa nyid// rig pa rang snang rol pa yin// de dag phun sum tshogs pas bshad// lung gi spyi nyid yin pa'i phyir// spyi don lnga yis bshad pa ni// lo rgyus don dang rtsa ba dang// yo ga'i don dang dgos ched dang// tshig gi don dang bstan pa'o// ston pa chos sku'i rang bzhin nyid// dus gsum rgyal ba'i dgongs pa'i rgyud// nyid la nyid snang don de nyid// byin gyis brlabs kyis bshad pa yin// dgongs pas bshad pa'i don da la// ting 'dzin rig pa'i gdeng gi go/ rang bzhag ma bcos don gyi tshig/ rang gi ngo bos bshad pa'o// dman pa skal zhan gang zag la// rna brgyud gsang ba'i 'phrul tshig gis// 'grel brjod brda yi tshig gis bstan// brjod pa'i tshig gis bshad pa yin// ji snyed chos rnams thams cad kun// ma lus 'dus pa'i snying po nyid// gcig nyid kun gyi rang bzhin te// lhag ma med par yongs su rdzogs// rgya mtsho 'dus pa'i snying po ltar// theg pa'i khyad par thams cad kun// 'di las 'byung zhing 'dir 'dus pas// sems nyid rdzogs pa'i theg pa yin// ma bcos sems kyi rang bzhin la// brda dang tha snyad kun 'das kyang// de nyid nges par rtogs bya'i phyir// rdzogs chen bstan pa bkod pa yin// de dag tshig gi lde mig gis// rin chen mdzod kyi sgo phye la// ma nor don de bstan pa'i phyir// tshig gi don ni bkod pa yin// ma nor don gyi snying po nyid// rna brgyud 'phrul gyi lde mig 'di// ma lus kun gyi gsang ba ste// dgu rum sbas pa'i gter yin pas// skal ngan las kyi

bsgribs pa la// ma nor sems kyi gter bstan pas// sbrel ma g.yang du 'gril ba bzhin// lhung nas thar pa'i rigs dang bral// zhes gsungs so// nam mkha'i mtha' dang mnyam pa'i rgyud chen po las/ bshad pa lde mig gi le'u ste so gcig pa'o//// de nas yang sems dpa' rdo rje dam pa la// 'dus pa'i tshogs kyis 'di skad ces gsol to// dus gsum rgyal ba thams cad kyis// gsang ba'i 'khor lo rig pa'i gter// ma lus rang snang 'khor lor sgrogs// mgon po khyod la gsol ba ni// ngo bo nyid ni ji ltar lags// de dag rkyen du ji ltar 'gyur// mtshon pa'i thabs su gang zhig 'gyur// lam gyi ngo bo ji lta bu// dpe yis mtshon par ji ltar rung// bdag cag rnams la bshad du gsol// zhes gsol to// de nas sems dpa' rdo rjes 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// 'dus pa'i tshogs ni da nyon cig/ byang chub sems dpa'i ngo bo ni// ma lus 'dus pa'i snying po ste// ro gcig rnam pa brjod las 'das// ma 'phros nyi zla'i dkyil 'khor ltar// sna tshogs rang gi don la rdzogs// sgro 'dogs skur 'debs gdod nas stong// ma lus rdo rje'i snying po ste// de nyid lhun grub gsum yi ngang// ma bcos sku gsum lhun gyis grub// rin chen 'bar ba'i gling bzhin du// mthong dang ma mthong 'gyur med ltar// gsang ba'i rang bzhin 'gyur ba med// blo dang rgyu rkyen byed pa po// gdod nas med pas lhunagyis grub// ma lus rig pa snying po'i gsung// thams cad sgral ba nyid kyi sgra// ma lus chos kun rang bzhin ni// rang bzhin gnas pa'i ngo bor rdzogs// gang du rkyen bshad pa nyid ni// phyi dang nang gi mthar phyin rkyen// yon tan kun ldan bla ma nyid// gsal bar byed pa'i rkyen yin te// de dag bral ba'i gang zag ni// rna brgyud bral ba'i gter bzhin no// rang gnas gnyug ma'i rkyen med na// gter khyim stong par zhugs par ltar// nam mkha'i mtha' thug bar du ni// thar pa'i snying po don dang bral// gang la gang gi thabs bstan pas// snang srid zhi ltar snang ba kun// gsal ba'i me long nyid 'gyur te// gang la bltas kyang de nyid mthong// thabs dang ldan pa'i rnal 'byor la// snang srid sgron mar rang 'char te// brda dang bral ba'i rnal 'byor la// ye shes 'char nub med par gnas// rang rkyen rang la grol ba ni// chu yi gnyer ma lta bu ste// ma lus snang yang ro gcig pas// dbang po'i khyad par ji bzhin du// gsal byed thabs dang mi ldan na// 'du ba 'khrugs pa'i skyes bu ltar// bdag nyid sdug bsngal thar mi 'gyur// brgyud dang mngon sum khyad par gyis// bcom ma'i rnal ma'i sgo nas bstan// 'phen pa dang po'i dus na

rtogs// 'phen pa gsum yang shes par bya// bya ba btang ba'i du nyid dang// rdzogs pa thugs phrad pa nyid dang// dbang po thugs phrad 'bar ba dang// rmad byung sku gsum las rdzogs pa// mngon du gsal ba'i thabs chen yin// theg pa'i khyad par las byung ba'i// bcos mas mtshon pa gang yang rung// ma rtogs bcos pa'i thabs bstan la// rtogs pas rol pa rang snang nyid// ji snyed bcos ma'ang gsum nyid de// rtogs pas rtog pa bcos pa dang// ye shes sgyu mas bcos pa dang// bde chen sgyu mas bcos pa'o// thabs sbyor bcos ma'i sgo dag ni// lnga gnyis gsum gyis tshul bstan pa// phyi nang gnas pa'i mar me ni// bstan nas khyab pa'i rnal 'byor te// yul sems bral ba'i de bzhin nyid// rang la nyams dang rjes mthun pa'i// dngos po gang la gsal skye ba// dmigs pa spong ba'i man ngag ste// rang byung stong pa'i klong du grol// spyod lam gang la gang rig pa// phyi nang 'dres pa'i rnal 'byor te// ma bcos so mar gang gzhag pa// mi g.yo brtan pa'i rnal 'byor gnas// rang byung snyan pa'i ma brjod sgra// rang la mnyan pas rang gis thos// dus gsum rig pa brtan gyur nas// tha ma snying po'i ngang du grol// dang po phyogs ris med pa la// dbang po bsgrims pas gang bltas pa// ma mthong rdo rje snying po nyid// 'du 'phro med pa'i dbyings la gnas// rnam par g.yeng ba'i gang zag la// rig pa bsgrims pa'i man ngag bstan// rtse gcig goms par brtan gyur na// rang byung glod pas grol bar 'gyur// nyams kyi rig pa gar skyes pa// myong dang snang dang 'dres pa dang// rig pa rdzogs pa mi g.yo ba// mi 'da' phyag rgya'i man ngag yin// dang po skyes nas nyams su myong// goms pas de nyid rtogs zhen log/ ma btsal lhug pa'i ngang du gnas// bde ba chen po bag chad med// rgyu ba nang du bcad pa yis// rtogs spyod med pa ye shes nyid// gom pas phyi nang med pa yi// rang byung bde ba gsal bar 'gyur// dbang po thog med man ngag gi/ rten nam brten med btsal med pa'i// dbang po phyogs med gsal bar gnas// ma bsam bzhag pas grol bar 'gyur/// btsal bral zin dang ma zin par// rang byung rig pa shes pa ni// dus tshod 'dzin pa'i man ngag ste/ de nyid ma yengs gsal bar gnas// mi g.yo chu yi rang bzhin la// dbang po dal bar yan gzhag pas// lteng chu lta bu'i man ngag ste// ma btsal rig pa dbyings las grol// thig le shum las brten pa gnyis// phyi nang rten dang bral ba yis// ma lus shes shing brda phrad nas// 'bab chu'am mar me ji bzhin no// ma bcos rig pa don gyi lam// ma lus ro gcig snying po ltar// ma lus ting 'dzin

'bum phrag yas// dran rtog ma lus gcig tu 'khyil// ma lus bde chen snying po bas// dbang po yan gzhag ye shes gsal// thig le chen por kun 'dus pas// mi bgrod mi sbyong rtogs pas phyin// rtogs pas ma bcos sangs rgyas sa// lam gyi dpe bdun yan lag gis// de ltar phyogs ris med pa dang// ting 'dzin ma bsgoms gsal ba dang// de dag yon tan lhun rdzogs dang// de dag brtan pa'i gdeng nyid dang// rtogs pas ma bgrod phyin pa dang// thams cad ma 'dres yongs rdzogs pas// mtha' bral gcig tu gnas pa ste// bdun gyi lam nyid dpe nyid bstan pa yin// zhes gsungs so// nam mkha'i mtha' dang mnyam pa'i rgyud chen po las// rin chen gzung zhing brten pa'i le'u ste so gnyis pa'o//// de nas yang sems dpa' rdo rje la// rang snang rol pa'i tshogs kyis 'di skad ces gsol to// rang byung nyi ma 'od kyi bdag/ rang byung lhun rdzogs rin po che// thabs mkhas thugs rje bsam mi khyab// mgon po khyod la gsol ba ni// thig le zlum po ji ltar lags// nyon mongs lam zhes ji ltar rigs// mdzod dgu zhes ni ji ltar bgyi// bdag la legs par bstan du gsol// zhes gsol to// 'dus pa'i tshogs chen da nyon cig/ thig le ma 'phros zlum po'i don// de nyid gsum du bstan pa ste// ma bcos khyab pa'i thig le dang// mtshan ma brda yi thig le dang// rtog pa don gyi thig le nyid// snying po ngang la khyad par med// gdod nas snying po rang bzhin gcig/ ma bcos thig le rdzogs pa nyid// rig pa khong stong nang na gnas// ji snyed chos rnams ma lus pa// de las byung zhing der 'dus pas// phyogs ris med par brdal ba nyid// bzlums dang cha shas med pa dang// khong stong pa dang kun brdal dang// 'phro zhing 'dus pas thig le ste// nam mkha' rgyas pa'i mtha' bzhin du// ma lus khyab pa chen por gnas// ma lus gnas pa'i snying po'i don// sgro skur 'das pa'i tshad ma ni// sangs rgyas kun gyi thugs nyid pas// dgu rum sbas pa'i don de nyid// mtshan ma rdo yi thig le yis// thams cad rang byung snying por mtshon// rat+na maN+Dal zlum po la// dang po khong chos nyid de// rtsa ba med pa'i snying por bstan// de las 'od du gang 'phros pa// dkyil 'khor 'dod pa lnga rnams dang// chags sdang sna tshogs gang ldan pa// tha ma med pa'i thog mar ldog/ rtsa ba dang bral rtse mo nyid// rang gi ngo bo de bzhin te// snying po'i don las dbye ba med// snang srid thig le der chud pas// thig le chen por rgyas btab pa'o// mtshon pa brda yi thig le ste// rig pa'i tshad ma'ang snying po 'di// bskal pa'i srid pa 'khrugs gyur

kyang// dman par rigs min gang zag la// rna brgyud gsang ba bstan byas na// bar mtshams med pa'i mgyogs 'gro ltar// na rag rdo rje gnas su lhung// skal ldan las kyis 'phrad pa la// thabs dang gsang ba'i don shugs kyis// gsal ba'i 'od dang rin chen ltar// snang srid bde ba chen por sbar// re dogs gnyis kyi yul las 'das// bgrod rtsol rgyu 'bras lam dang bral// rtogs pa'i thig le kun chub pas// snying po don la gru zur ba dang// phyogs mtshams rigs bcad yul las 'das// ji snyed dran rig myong tshor chos// rang byung rang grol rang zhi ba// rgya mtsho chen po chu bur ltar// ma btsal rang byung pha rol phyin// sangs rgyas sems can gnyis med pas// 'dod sems bgrod rtsol med par gnas// 'di na snying po'i lam yin pas// btsal ba med par don kun rdzogs// kun gyis spangs ba'i chags sdang lnga// bcings shing sdug bsngal ngan 'gro'i lam// reg pas sdug bsngal skye ba'i dgu// thun mong kun la grags pa nyid// rna brgyud bar chad med pa yi// rin chen thugs kyi bdud rtsi yis// skal ldan gang la des phog na// rin chen 'bar ba'i gling mthong ltar// phyin chad nyon mongs gang byung ba// ma bcos snying po'i ngang du mthong// ma lus snying po stong nyid la// dang po de las byung ba dang// de ltar de la gnas pa dang// tha ma de nyid rang grol ba// nyon mongs snying po lam du gsungs// gang du ma bcos snying po'i don// 'dod pa 'byung dag don rdzogs shing// zad pa med pas gter mdzod de// gdul bya grangs la dga' ba la// che ba'i yon tan dgur bstan te// klong dgus rtogs pa'i yul du bstan// che ba'i yon tan bsam yas pas// mdzod kyis grangs la mthar thug med// rig pa'i snying po gcig tu 'khyil// zhes gsungs so// nam mkha'i mtha' dang mnyam pa'i rgyud chen po las/ mdzod dgu rin chen gter bshad pa'i le'u ste so gsum pa'o//// de nas yang sems dpa' rdo rje dam pa la/ rang snang rig pa'i 'khor tshogs kyis 'di skad ces gsol to// rol pa'i 'khor lo gsum gyi bdag/ 'dod pa'i don 'byung phyogs ris med// rmad byung sku gsung thugs kyi mchog/ mgon po khyod la gsol ba ni// rin chen dbyig ni ji ltar lags// gdod nas snying por gcig pa la// bla ma man ngag ci zhig la// de yi brtag pa dgos ched ci// snying po rang bzhin dpe bral la// dpe yis mtshon du ji ltar lags// re dogs med pa'i rang bzhin la// skal med ltung ba ji ltar lags// bdag cag rnams la bshad du gsol// zhes gsol to// de nas sems dpa' rdo rjes 'di skad ces gsungs so// 'dus pa chen po da nyon

cig/ rang byung sems nyid rin po che// rgyu rkyen 'das pa'i snying po la// ma lus yon tan lhun grub pas// rang sems rin chen dbyig cig brjod// rin chen gzi 'phrog khog seng ltar// skal dang mos pa'i khyad par gyis// sna tshogs bar med shugs kyis 'grub// rig pa rang snang yon tan no// rigs drug ma lus thams cad la// ro yi tshul du khyab gnas kyang// ma rtogs rnam pa'i rjes 'brangs ltar// gnas pa gsum gyi rang bzhin la// skal med 'phrul tshig mi ldan pas// sdug bsngal 'khor ba'i ngo bor smin// de nyid snying por bstan pa'i phyir// rna brgyud yon tan kun ldan pa'i// bla ma slob dpon dam pa brten// dam pa'i rang bzhin mi ldan zhing// bskal pa 'khrugs par don byas kyang// long bas rigs ngan grol ba'i phyir// rgyal sar gzhag bzhin mi 'grub pas// bla ma dman dang dam pa nyid// ma nor brtag pa shin tu gces// dam pa ma yin gang brten pas// ldongs pas lam sna drangs pa ltar// ltung zhing thar pa'i rigs dang bral// rang byung snying po thams cad don// phyogs dang ris kyi mi mtshon yang// dman pa'i tshig gis drangs pa'i phyir// mtshon pa dpe yi tshul gyis bstan// byang chub sems kyi rang bzhin ni// phyogs ris med par rang snang bas// ma bcos rtogs pa'i rnal 'byor la// re dogs 'jigs pa mi gnas kyang// ma rtogs 'khrul ba'i gang zag la// zhen pa'i bsgribs g.yogs rags pa yis// chu dang nor bu 'phrad pa'am// 'bras dang thag pas 'khrul pa ltar// ma grub don la zhen pa yis// log par spyod pa ltung bar 'gyur// zhes gsungs so// nam mkha'i mtha' dang mnyam pa'i rgyud chen po las// rig pa mtshon pa'i dpe don bshad pa'i le'u ste sum cu bzhi pa'o//// de nas sems dpa' rdo rje la/ rang snang rol ba'i 'khor tshogs kyis 'di skad ces gsol to// rgyal ba kun gyi gter 'dzin pas// gsang ba'i 'khor lo 'bar ba'i sku// byams mgon lhun grub bya btsal med// mgon po khyod la gsol ba ni// bla ma nyid la dmigs pa ci// thabs de gang gis rtogs par 'gyur// gsol gdab gnang ba'i dus tshod ci// mi ldan skyon yon gang las 'byung// mgon pos bdag la bshad du gsol// zhes gsol to// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rang bzhin gyi byin gyis brlabs kyis/ sems dpa' rdo rjes 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// 'dus pa'i tshogs chen da nyon cig/ dus gsum rgyal ba thams cad kyi// dgongs pa'i gter 'chang rdo rje 'dzin// ma lus don du gnyer gzigs pa// 'dod pa'i don kun rdzogs pa'i bdag/ yon tan kun ldan bla ma la// rtag tu yid kyis dmigs pa

dag/ las dang nyon mongs lta ba dang// shes bya'i sgrib pa ji snyed pa// bla ma rin chen gnang ba des// gzigs pas mun pa sel ba dang// mgyogs pas snang bas rgyas par khebs// bskal pa'i mtha' ma rab sbyangs shing// pha ma bu dang bran dang spun// nor bu sa gzhi gru yi sems// 'bab chu dge slong rgya che'i don// sngon du bya ba kun byas shing// lus dang srog dang chung ma dang// rin chen bdun gyis mnyes byas la// snying po man ngag 'jug pa'i tshe// sbyang ba'i cho ga rgya cher bya// dang por sgo brgyad ldan pa'i khri// mdzes shing 'jam pa'i steng bzhugs la// maN+Dal rin chen bdun las byas// rin chen sil ma'i me tog can// dgu 'am bdun nam lnga phul nas// tshogs kyi rdo rje mkha' 'gro'i tshogs// mnyes nas rin chen sbubs bcas te// lus sems gus pas me tog dag/ phul te gsol ba gdab par bya// bla ma sangs rgyas de yis kyang// zhen chags tha mal sems spangs nas// snying rje'i bsam pas gnang ba sbyin// phul te gsol ba gdab par bya// bla ma sangs rgyas de yis kyang// zhen chags tha mal sems spangs nas// snying rje'i bsam pas gnang ba sbyin// dam tshig dbang bskur cho ga spyad// de nas tha mal zhen pa bzlog/ rang rang zhen pa bsal ba'i phyir// rna brgyud sbubs kyi byin gyis brlabs// dang por chu gzar thig pa yis// 'jig rten rtag pa'i zhen pa bzlog/ nyams myong gnad dang mi gtsang bas// zhen chags can gyi 'du shes bzlog/ snying po med pa'i man ngag gis// snang ba bzlog pa'i cho ga bya// de ltar lta ba'i shes rab dag/ stong pa'i klong du dbugs phyung ste// bdag gzhan 'du shes kun bral ba'i// spros pa kun bral bsam gtan bya// tha mal zhen pa bcad pa yi// rang snang phyag rgyas gang ba yin// rang sems chu yi lbu ba ltar// ye shes phyag rgyas gdab par bya// rin chen sbyangs pa'i cho ga ltar// gdod nas rang snang phyag rgya nyid// gling bzhi rgyal po dmigs sprad ltar// gzhan las ma yin rang snang nyid// rin chen 'bar ba'i khong seng du// pad+ma'i snying po kha sbyor bzhi// thig le k+ShuM dang baM gyis brgyan// thabs kyis lam gsum rkyen bcas pas// nyi mas bcud la phog pa ltar// thig le bcud kyis gang byas pas// thig le'i rtags ni 'byung bar 'gyur// rang brgyud ye shes snang bar bsnubs// de nyid bde ba chen por smin// de nyid mtha' bral chen por bstan// phyi dang nang dang sems nyid kyis// 'phen pa dang ni sdud pa dang// gnas dang bstan dang sbyang ba dang// brtag dang bgrang dang nam mkhar 'phang// rgyu ba rlung gi man ngag gis// mchog dang dman pa la sogs pa'i// nus pa bstan pas nges 'grub ste// 'brel dang bar

chad bsal ba dang// mthar phyin mchau ga rgyas par bya// gang la gang gis 'dul ba yi// gang de de nyid bstan pa'i phyir// gang du shes rab 'di 'ong ba// sangs rgyas kun gyi gzhal yas khang// thabs kyis dga' mgur blo bsgyur te// bsnyen pa nus ldan tshad rdzogs nas// a nyid rgyas par zla rgyas bzhin// de nas pa nyid rgyas pa ni// de nyid ra yi rkyen yin pas// tha mal zhen pa sa yis gsal// dza hUM baM ho'i sbyor ba yis// 'phen dang sdud pa'i rtags 'byung ste// snang ba rim nas rim bsdus te// 'phen pa zad pa'i skabs nyid dam// sdud pa hUM gas mngon par shes/ khyab pa'i a yis gang ba dang// ma lus snang ba bsgyur snang na// kha dog 'gyur dang mi bstan nas// rten med a la gnas par bya// ma lus bde chen mi rtog pa// mi gnas stong pa'i mya ngan 'das// de nas ma bcos stobs kyis 'jug/ phyogs ris med pa'i mngon shes brten// rgyu ba dwangs pa'i cho ga bya// shes pa nam mkha'i dbyings su bsre// rnyog pa bral ba'i rgyun gyis 'jug/ thams cad ma bcos snying po la// 'khor dang mya ngan 'das med do// thig le chen po'i rang bzhin yang// thabs dang bral ba'i rgyal po ltar// rna brgyud man ngag bral ba'i mthus// ma rtogs zhen pas ltung ba dang// de nyid rtogs pas pha rol phyin// co rong ye shes snying por mthong// sdug bsngal bde ba chen por gnas// zhes gsungs so// nam mkha'i mtha' dang mnyam pa'i rgyud chen po las/ shes bya thabs kyis gtan la phab pas nam mkhar thim pa'i le'u ste sum cu lnga pa'o//// de nas yang sems dpa' rdo rje la/ rang snang rig pa'i 'khor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// rgyal ba kun gyis gsang ba'i bdag/ byang chub snying po ji bzhin gsal// tshig la dbang sgyur gsang ba'i mdzod// mgon po khyod la gsol ba ni// gnyis med gcig ni ji ltar ltar// mtshan ma'i tha snyad ji ltar bral// rig pa'i gdeng zhes gang la bgyi// legs par bdag la bshad du gsol// zhes gsol to// de nas sems dpa' rdo rje dam pa des 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// 'dus pa'i tshogs chen da nyon cig/ byang chub snying po'i rang bzhin du// mi mthun gnyen po'i chos med de// rang la rang snang de khyad med// rang snang rig pa'i 'khor lo la// ma lus rdzogs pa'i ngo bo bas// rnam pa'i khyad par ci yang snang// gnyis med rig pa gcig tu gnas// rang bzhin gnyis med nyid du bshad// thams cad rang byung snying po nyid// rol pa ma 'dres lhun grub pa// ji bzhin don du dbyer med kyang// thabs dang brgyud pa'i man ngag gis// snod dang ldan pa'i skyes bu la// mngon sum rig pa'i tshad mas bstan// phyogs

ris med pa'i ngo bor gsal// snying po rig pa'i klong du gsal// rtogs pa gnyis su med pa yin// ji snyed chos rnams thams cad kun// re dogs chad par rang gsal bas// dran rtogs snang grags ma lus pa// ting 'dzin yan lag rgya mtshor gsal// mkha' la rol pa rgyan snang ltar// re dogs phyogs ris yongs kyi med// goms pa gnyis su med pa yin// ma lus rdzogs pa'i snying po nyid// chos kun ngo bor rang shar bas// ma lus ye shes klong brdal bas// thams cad mthar phyin ye shes nyid// dngos po thig ler gsal ba la// 'phro 'du phyogs ris med pas te// ye shes rgya mtsho mthar thug med// gdod nas thig le'i ngo bo la// ji snyed thams cad kun 'dus pas// phyi nang rgyu 'bras gzung 'dzin dang// zin chags rtsol sgrub la sogs pa'i// sna grangs pa yi chos rnams kun// ngo bo rtogs dang goms pa dang// mthar phyin gnyis med rang bzhin no// ji snyed rang rang tha mal pa'i// phyi nang ji snyed gnas pa ni// skye mched drug ste lha mor brtag/ dngos po gcig la gang rdzogs pa// tha mal zhen pa bzlog phyir te// dkyil 'khor drug po'i rang bzhin gyis// rang sems ma skyes ngang du bstan// de nyid bde ba chen po ste// rang rgyud rgyu 'bras ltos pa dang// phyi nang mtshan ma'i yul las 'das// mnyam pa'i don gyi snying po la// re dogs mtshan ma'i yul las 'das// dus ngan las kyi snyigs ma la// tshig gi gdeng la zhen pa dang// mtshan ma'i don la rtog pa dang// 'dod pa lnga la mtshan ma yis// bsgyur te bde bar zhen pa yis// ma bcos snying ma'i don bor nas// mtshan ma'i dga' bde gtsor gzung nas// rdo la gser du zhen pa ltar// rang rtags log pa'i rnal 'byor gyis// bskal ba nam mkha'i mtha' gtugs par// bsgoms kyang 'bras bu mi 'byung ste// bde ba chen po 'don dang bral// thog ma med pa'i zhen pa dag/ thun mong thun mong ma yin pa'i// ji nang ji snyed gnas pa rnams// gnas skabs yul la gcig tu rdzogs// rtags pas yul shes kun bral ba'i// stong nyid 'od gsal mngon du mthong// de las byung ba'i rol pa ni// rgya mtsho chu yi ri mo ltar// skad cig tsam gyis gsal gyur te// thams cad re dogs med par shes// ma bcos don gyi gdeng yin te// skal ldan rnams kyis shes par bya// ji snyed sangs rgyas thams cad kyis// sku gsung thugs kyi bdud rtsi'i rgyun// rgyal ba rgya mtsho rtogs pa'i don// thugs rje byin rlabs dgongs pa yis// rgyal sras gsang ba'i rnal 'byor la// thabs dang rig pa'i mngon sum mam// rna brgyud 'brel bas mngon ston pa// rgyud pa thabs kyi gdeng du bshad// ma bcos don gyi gdeng med

par// rang rang zhen pa'i rtogs spyod kyis// rang lta ya rabs mthor ston nas// 'dod lnga'i chos la bab chol spyod// kun kyang log pa'i don bltas nas// rdo rje'i khab tu ltung bar 'gyur// zhes gsungs so// nam mkha'i mtha' dang mnyam pa'i rgyud chen po las// rig pa rang gsal don gyis bshad pa'i le'u ste sum cu drug pa'o//// de nas yang sems dpa' rdo rje la// rang snang rig pa'i 'khor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// kye ma'o sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// rang snang byin rlabs ya mtshan che// sna tshogs gnyis med gnas pa la// 'khrul rtog sna tshogs rkyen gyis bslad// gang phyir bsgribs dang 'khrul pa ste// de dag thabs dang rnal 'byor gang// khyad par ji ltar rtogs pa yis// ma bcos don la ji ltar 'jug/ 'di dag legs par bshad du gsol// zhes gsol to// de nas sems dpa' rdo rje dam pa des 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// 'dus pa'i tshogs chen da nyon cig/ chos rnams kun gyi rang bzhin nyid// ma lus kun 'dus snying po ste// gcig nyid kun gyi rang bzhin pas// lhag ma med par yongs su rdzogs// de yang rang rkyen bzlog sa dang// rna brgyud bdud rtsi don bral bas// phyogs 'dzin log pa'i 'du shes kyis// ma bcos snying po bsgrubs shing 'khrul// lta spyod log pa'i nga rgyal gyis// bskal pa bye ba brgya phrag tu// long bas lam du zhugs pa ltar// 'dod pa'i don dang 'phrad mi 'gyur// ma bcos rtogs pa'i don med na// thun mong rtog spyod bsam gtan dang// lha dang bde ba'i ting 'dzin gyis// ma bcos rtogs par mi 'gyur te// 'khor bar nyid du ltung bar 'gyur// ji ltar chu rlabs 'khrig pa dag/ rkyen gyis gang ltar shar ba nyid// sna tshogs chu yi rang bzhin ltar// bcos ma'i don kyang de bzhin no// 'jig rten log pa la sogs pa'i// theg pa sna tshogs bsam gtan dag/ rang rang tshul gyis goms byas te// rig pa phyogs ris med par bstan// 'dis ni nam mkha'i mtha' thug pa// rdo rje 'od gsal nyid du 'gyur// mi rtag phyi nang thams cad dang// sdug bsngal na ba'i rgyun la sogs// phyi nang bdag med stong pa'i sems// so so'i cha shas dmigs bral bas// 'jig rten zhen pa dus gcig zlog/ dman pas mi gtsang rnal 'byor dang// srog dang rlung gis brtag pa dang// bdag nyid dmigs pa bsgoms pa yis// rim pas 'gog pa'i dka' thub yis// 'phags pa'i lam la sbyor ba byed// yid brtan 'dzin pa bzlog pa dang// zhen pa spang phyir bstan pa nyid// srid pa'i 'khor lo thog mtha' med// de nyid rten cing 'brel 'byung ste// 'khor lo rim gsum snying po med// 'byung dang rtog dang ma rig 'gog/ 'gog pa'i stong pa

mngon du byed// rkyen gyis phyi nang rtogs goms nas// zag pa zad pas cho 'phrul 'grub// phyi nang ma lus thams cad kun// kun rdzogs nus pa'i khyad par nyid// cha shas bral ba'i nam mkha' ste// phyi nang bar du mngon brtags pas// nam mkha'i rnal 'byor grub pa yis// lta spyod goms pa'i lam gyis tshol/ kha cig rig pa'i rang bzhin nyid// rang snang mi snang 'du shes med// blo yi sbyor ba zad pa yi// dag pa'i nyams myong snying por 'dod/ kha cig sgyu ma brag cha ltar// sgo gsum goms pa'i rang bzhin gyis// ma lus kun kyang de bzhin te// 'bras bu ye shes sgyu mar gsal// bden dang brdzun pa'i mtha' chod nas// rig pa spros bral mi gnas pa// gang yang mi gnas pa yi don// ma skyes stong pa'i rang bzhin no// tha mal sgo gsum bsgyur ba'i phyir// rigs gsum dkyil 'khor sku gsung thugs// tha mal 'joms byed rdo rje ste// bdag dang gzhan phan de bzhin gshegs// dpal ldan skyon bral pad+ma'i mchog/ ma lus rigs gsum goms pa yis// rang 'dod 'bras bu mthar phyin thob// gang du gnyis ka'i mthar 'dzin pa// de kho na nyid gzhi dag gis// snang srid goms pa'i dbang thob ste// sku dang gsung thugs bzlas brjod kyis// gtsang ma'i rigs 'dzin gral thob nas// rdo rje 'dzin pa'i ltung ba dang// rtsol ba'i chu bos g.yengs pa yi// re dogs 'dzin pa dag mi 'gyur// zhes gsungs so// nam mkha'i mtha' dang mnyam pa'i rgyud chen po las/ bcos ma'i dbang bshad pa'i le'u ste sum cu bdun pa'o//// de nas yang sems dpa' rdo rje dam pa la// rang snang rig pa'i 'khor tshogs kyis 'di skad ces gsol to// dus gsum rgyal ba thams cad kyi// rang byung phun sum tshogs pa'i bdag/ rang gsal rol pa kun la gsal// bstan pa ma lus 'byung ba'i gzhi// mgon po khyod la gsol ba ni// phun sum tshogs pa gang las byung// ngo bo dgos pa ci las gyur// de nyid rtogs pa ji lta bu// skyes bu chen pos bshad du gsol// de nas sems dpa' rdo rjes 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rang byung ye shes byang chub sems// ji snyed phun sum tshogs pa dang// sku dang gsung thugs zhing khams dang// che ba'i mdzad pa ma lus pa// kun rdzogs yid bzhin nor bu ste// 'phel 'grib med pa'i rin chen dbyig/ bstan pa'i theg pa ma lus pa// ma lus 'char gzhi snying po nyid// rang byung snying po stong pa'i lung// rtsa ba bral ba'i yan lag ltar// ma lus kun gyi ngo bo yin// lung dang rig pa'i tshad ma yis// kun gyi snying po 'di rtogs na// phun sum tshogs pa ma lus pa// rig pa gcig tu gtan la phebs// gzhi rtsa med pa'i snying po nyid// ma

bcos rol pa bde ba nyid// rang nyid thugs rje ngo bo nyid// sku gsum phun sum tshogs pa ste// ngo bo rang byung ye shes nyid// 'dod pa'i don snang dngos po med// gnas dang ston pa 'khor dang dus// sdud dang bstan pa rang bzhin nyid// sku gsum so sor dbye ba ste// de dag che chung khyad par gyis// rang rang so sor phye ba yis// theg pa'i rim par snang ba ni// der yang phun sum tshogs pa ste// nam mkha'i dbyings kyi mtha' klas par// phun sum tshogs pa gang ba ste// rang byung snying po thog mtha' med// sangs rgyas kun gyi rang bzhin nyid// thog ma tha ma'i dus med par// gdul bya spro ba bskyed pa'i phyir// phun sum tshogs pa nyid du gnas// gdul bya las kyi khyad par gyis// rim pa dag tu gang snang yang// nam mkha'i rgyan ltar gnas pa yin// 'di dag dbang po'i khyad par ltar// rang byung byin gyis brlabs shugs dang// dbang po rab 'bring khyad par dang// gdul bya'i nus pa ma stobs thabs dang// rang byung rol pa'i rang snang ba// phye ba'i khyad par bstan phyir yin// phyogs bcu nam mkha'i mtha' klas pa'i// gdul bya'i bsam pa bskang ba dang// rang byung che ba bstan pa'i phyir// rgyal ba'i zhing khams thams cad du// ma 'dres mdzes pa'i me tog ltar// rang byung che ba'i yon tan snang// rang byung rig pa'i rgyal po nyid// gang la gang snang de dag nyid// gdul bya'i thabs ni mtha' yas par// 'gro ba dman pa'i ched du bstan// de dag ma lus snying po nyid// nam mkha'i mtha' dang mnyam pa yi// rol pa snying por bstan pa'i mchog/ sangs rgyas kun gyi sku gsung thugs// bstan pa 'di nyid zhugs pa yi// 'di dag rdo rje 'dzin pa yis// phyogs bcu nam mkha'i 'jig rten khams// rdul snyed grangs la 'das pa nyid// sangs rgyas nyid du mngon snang nas// skal ldan snying la 'jug par mdzad// de tshe 'khor ni ji snyed pa// kun kyang rang gi yid la 'jug/ 'das dang da ltar ma byon pa'i// snying po bsam mi khyab pa'i dus// mngon du bstan pa tshad mas rtogs// re dogs spyod pa chad pa'i dus// thog ma tha ma med pa'i gnas// dngos dang dngos med kun spangs pa'i// rang byung snying po gsang ba'i don// rig pa phyogs bral rtogs pa'i gnas// don gyi dbus chen mtha' dbus med// ma bcos gnas su rtogs pas phyir// skal ldan rnal 'byor rtogs pa yis// theg pa'i khyad par ji snyed pa// shes rab chen po skad cig la// chos rnams ro gcig bsdus pa'i bdag/ dbang po nus stobs ldan pa la// ji snyed dran rtogs rgyu ba kun// zag med snying po'i bstan pa ste// nam mkha'i mtha' dang mnyam pa'i rgyud// rang byung rtogs pa'i snying po nyid// sangs rgyas kun gyi

gsang ba'i lung// 'phrul tshig rdo rje lu gu brgyud// gsang ba'i rig pa'i kha sbyor te// phyi lta nang lta sems su sbyor// rtsa ba'i phun sum tshogs par bshad// ces gsungs so// nam mkha'i mtha' dang mnyam pa'i rgyud chen po las/ phun sum tshogs pa rtsa ba gcig tu bshad pa'i le'u ste sum cu brgyad pa'o//// de nas yang sems dpa' rdo rje dam pa la/ rang snang rol ba'i 'khor tshogs kyis 'di skad ces gsol to// sku gsung thugs kyi bdag nyid khyod// rang byung snying po'i don la 'dus// rang snang 'od kyi snang ba'i mchog/ mgon po khyod la gsol ba ni// rang gsal sku gsung thugs gang zhig/ de nyid gang gis gsal bar bgyi// khyad par rim par ji ltar 'gyur// zhes gsol to// de nas sems dpa' rdo rjes 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// ma lus rang snang 'khor lo bas// rang snang snying po 'pho 'gyur med// gnas pa'i sgro skur ma lus pa// rig pa gcig gi don du gnas// ma lus kun rdzogs snying po 'di// gnas dang rtogs dang mthar phyin pa'i// sku gsung thugs kyi rtsa ba yin// ji snyed snang grangs thams cad kyi// dbyibs dang kha dog che chung dang// ma lus ji ltar gnas pa dang// 'jig rten 'das dang ma 'das pa// phyogs dang ris la sogs pa ni// byang chub snying po'i sku ru shar// byang chub sems kyi sku nyid ni// rig pa phyogs ris med pa'i sku// thams cad 'dus pa'i 'khor lo ste// rig pa'i dkyil 'khor mtha' dbus med// rang bzhin sku yi mtshan nyid do// byang chub sems kyi gsung nyid ni// snying po 'od kyi rang bzhin ltar// ma lus gsung gi rang bzhin du// phyi nang ma lus thams cad shar// zin dang ma zin la sogs pa'i// brjod cing grags pa'i chos rnams ni// rang shar gsung gi mtshan nyid do// ji snyed myong tshor shes pa dang// dran rtogs rgyu ba ma lus pa// ma skyes rdo rje a yi ngang// ma lus rig pa 'khor lo'i thugs// gnyis bral rig pa bsam yas la// rang bzhin bsam pa cir mi rtog/ rang byung zhen pa yul las 'das// rang du ston pa mtha' yas pas// mthar thug med pa'i gdul bya la// theg pa ji snyed bstan pa yis// rang byung 'khor lo ma rtogs pas// sku gsung thugs kyi snying po nyid// sgro skur med par mthong ba med// skal ldan 'jig rten chos bral zhing// dman pa'i blo yang 'dzin sems log/ 'gro ba'i rig pa gang dag la// sngon du cho ga ji bzhin du// sangs rgyas ma lus kun 'dus pa'i// rdo rje 'dzin pa chen po yis// ma lus rig pa'i sku gsung thugs// de yi byin rlabs thabs kyis bstan// 'di dag ji ltar rtogs pa ltar// bstan pa'i yan lag kun dang 'brel// phyi rol ltas pas rtogs pa'i tshe// rig pa rang snang

'khor lor grol// gcong rong ye shes chen por brdal// sgo gsum sku gsung thugs su sbar// re dang dogs pa kun chad de// ma lus nam mkha'i dkyil 'khor ltar// phyogs 'dzin rgyu ba'i yid las 'das// ma lus sku gsung rdo rje nyid// gar yang ma phyin rtogs pas smin// 'bras bu rang 'bar bde chen 'grub// skal ldan rdo rje lus 'di la// snying po rang byung 'od kyi mchog/ phyogs las 'das pa'i rin po che// tshig gcig don kun rdzogs pa'i bdag/ rdo rje tshig gi sgron ma yis// dgu rum sbas pas don gsal nas// ma bgrod sa rnams dus gcig mnan// mtha' dbus med pa'i nam mkha' la// phyogs 'dzin bral ba'i blo yis lta// blang dor bral ba'i sgo gsum nyid// 'dzin pa log pa'i tshul gyis 'jug/ snang srid ma bcos bde ba'i sa// rtogs pa nyid kyi pha rol phyin// dka' bas spyad pa'i mngon gyur pa'i// sku gsung thugs kyi rdul snyed dang// dka' thub sdom par rab bsdams shing// bsnyen bsgrub rtsol ba las byung ba'i// sku gsung thugs kyi rdul snyed kun// nam mkha'i dbyings kyi mtha' don rtogs nas// skad cig tsam gyis grol bar 'gyur// rna brgyan gsang ba'i 'phral tshig 'di// gsang ba'i rigs can 'ga' zhig la// phyin ci log dang dman pa la// mngon du snang bar mi 'gyur ro// de dag gsang ba'i theg pa 'di// rna brgyud gdams pa nub pa dang// lta spyod log pa'i gdeng ldan dang// mtshan ma sgra la zhen pa dang// skal bar ldan dang mi ldan pa'i// 'dus pa mang po bstan pa dang// bla ma rang rtog zhen pa yis// nga nyams zhen pas bshad pa dang// rnam par dkar ba'i lam bor nas// nyon mongs zhen pa'i las byed dang// thun mong theg pa la smad pas// nyon mongs zhen pas rtsod pa'i mthus// bstan pa'i snying po nub par 'gyur// de nas 'dzam gling dbus su dar// skal ldan 'brel ba 'ang 'byung bar 'gyur// de nas lho phyogs rgyud du rgyas// nub kyi phyogs su'ang rgyas par 'gyur// byang gi phyogs dang shar phyogs su// ma bcos rdzogs pa'i theg pa 'dis// snang ba'i sgron ma byed par 'gyur// der yang skal ldan dam pa rnams// rnam grol sa la 'gro bar 'gyur// rna brgyud gter la ma chad pa dang// lta spyod log pa'i nga rgyal can// mtshan ma tshig la zhen pa rnams// rdo rje'i khab tu ltung bar 'gyur// rang byung byang chub snying po 'di// ma lus snying la gnas pa ste// dus gsum 'gyur ba med pa'i sems// ma bcos sems la 'gyur ba med// de bzhin lung bstan ldan pa yis// skal ldan rgyal sras slob ma la// thabs kyis ma bcos don bstan nas// 'khor ba rang grol don rtogs na// dus la 'gyur ba yod ma yin// snga phyi med pa'i da lta

nyid// ma bcos rtogs pas pha rol phyin// tha ma'i dus na 'byung bar 'gyur// zhes gsungs so// nam mkha'i mtha' dang mnyam pa'i rgyud chen po las// lung bshad pa'i le'u ste zhe brgyad pa'o//// de nas yang sems dpa' rdo rje dam pa de la/ 'dus pa chen po'i tshogs kyis 'di skad ces gsol to// dus gsum rgyal ba thams cad kyi// bstan pa kun gyi rang bzhin khyod// ma lus kun gyi 'byung gnas gter// mgon po khyod la gsol ba ni// rang byung thugs su gcig ce na// klong dgur dbye ba ji ltar lags// klong zhes ci phyir bya ba lags// gang gi skabs su ji ltar 'char// de dag dgos pa ji lta bu// mgon po khyod kyis bdag la gsungs// zhes gsungs to// de nas sems dpa' rdo rjes// 'dus pa'i tshogs la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// ji snyed chos rnams thams cad kun// ci ste tha dad yongs kyis med// rang byung rdzogs pa'i theg pa la// ma 'dus pa yi chos mi gnas// rangabazhin snang ba'i chos rnams dang// phyi nang dran rig thams cad dang// bstan pa'i bye brag ma lus pa// ji snyed khyad par bstan pa kun// rgya mtsho dang ni rlabs bzhin te// rig pa rang snang ma yin pa// gzhan pa nyid ni yod ma yin// rang byung theg pa'i snying po 'di// bstan pa kun gyi bdag nyid pas// rang byung bstan pa kun gyi bdag/ theg pa kun gyi rtsa ba yin// ma bcos snying po rdzogs pa la// tha dad rnam pa mi snang bas// rnam par dbye ba'i chos med kyang// rol pa'i snying po dgu ru shar// lta ba phyogs ris med pa'i klaung// spyod pa blang dor med par spyod// mtha' dbus med pa'i snying po len// rang byung thabs kyis rtogs pa'i dbang// rang byung don la 'das pa med// bya btsal kun bral 'phrin las rdzogs// ma lus dran bsam ting 'dzin klaung// ye shes ma bsgribs phyogs ris med// 'bras bu lhun rdzogs bya btsal med// rol ba'i bye brag dgur shar yang// byang chub sems la dbye ba med// ji ltar snar ba'i chos rnams kun// rang byung rdzogs pa'i ngo bo ste// phyi nang spyod yul dran rtog dang// bde sdug mtho dman ma lus kun// rgyu rkyen ngo bo tha dad med// chu yis 'khor lo bskor ba ltar// chu rlabs ri mo cir yang snang// ngo bo gcig tu gnas pa ltar// ji ltar snang grangs dran rtog kun// rang byung stong pa'i klong du brdal// ma lus byang chub lung du bsdus// rang bzhin gnas dang rtogs pa dang// mthar phyin spyod yul thams cad la// phyogs ris med dang sel med pas// de phyir 'di la klong zhes brjod// gzhan du lta bas mi gnas te// tha dad pa dang dgag sgrub dang// gnyis 'dzin rgyu 'bras la sogs pa// phyogs ris sel dang ldan phyir

ro// gang phyir theg pa'i snying po nyid// thabs chen gsang ba'i rig pa yis// dgu rum sbas pa'i don gsal na// phyogs ris med pa'i klaung du brdal// rang byung theg pa'i snying po nyid// dngos dbang gcig las mi gnas kyang// gang zag blo yi bye brag gis// gzhi lam 'bras bur rnam par snang// rang bzhin gnas po'i klong dgu dang// ma bcos rtogs pa'i glong dgu dang// thugs rje rol pa'i klong dgu nyid// skabs kyis khyad par so sor snang// ma bcos rol ba rang snang dang// zhen rtag rtogs pa rang snang gnyis// bye brag ma phyed gti mug blo// dngos nyid gtan la ma phebs par// nga rgyal dregs pa'i gdeng tshig gis// 'dod lnga bab chol spyad pa log/ de yi dus kyi gang zag rnams// sbrel ma g.yang du 'gril ba bzhin// bla ma ngan pa'i rjes 'brangs nas// rdo rje'i khab tu ltung gyur nas// byang chub sesam kyi rigs dang bral// ma bcos rdzogs pa'i ngo bo nyid// brda tshig zhen brjod kun bral yang// mtshan ma brda tshig zhen pa rnams// brjod pas don la dgod pa dang// theg pa kun gyi don rnams ni// 'di la rdzogs par bstan pa dang// ma 'dres khyab par bstan pa'i phyir// klong dgu'i khyad par bstan pa yin// de dag gang ltar snang gyur kyang// rang byung snying po de shar phyir// rgya mtsho chu bo 'du 'phro ltar// ma lus sems su 'dus pa yin// don gcig ma lus kun rdzogs pas// klong dgu thugs kyi yang snying 'di// rdo rje 'phrul gyi tshig gis bstan// ma bcos rig pa nyams kyis go/ bstan pa'i bye brag ji snyed pa// snying po don du kun 'dus pas// dngos don rtogs pa'i skad cig la// bstan pa ma lus dus gcig rtogs// snying po ro dang rnam pa ltar// gang ltar snang yang gcig tu myong// tha dad med de ngo bo gcig/ rang bzhin nam mkha'i mtha' ltar khyab// thugs rje bstan pa skar ltar bkram// ting 'dzin rgya mtsho rlung ltar zab// spyod pa phyogs bral kun tu spyod// gang yang klaung dgur ma 'dus med// ces gsungs so// nam mkha'i mtha' dang mnyam pa'i rgyud chen po las// klong dgu'i dbye ba bshad pa'i le'u ste zhe dgu pa'o//// de nas yang sems dpa' rdo rje dam pa la// 'dus pa chen po'i tshogs kyis 'di skad ces gsol to// sangs rgyas kun gyi rang bzhin khyod// ma lus sku gsung thugs la rdzogs// mi phyed rdo rje'i ngo bor gcig/ mgon po khyod la gsol ba ni// klong dgu'i bstan pa ji snyed pa// gnas pa'i ngo bo ji ltar gcig/ rtogs pa'i thabs ni ji ltar gcig/ rig pa'i nyams ni ji lta bu// 'bras bu khyad par ji ltar gcig/ gcig tu bstan pa'i dgos pa gang// bdag cag rnams la bshad du gsol// zhes gsol

to// de nas sems dpa' chen po gsang ba'i bdag pos 'di skas ces bka' stsal to// kye 'dus pa'i tshogs 'di lta ste// ma lus sems kyi rang bzhin las// rgyu 'bras lam dang 'bras bu dang// gzhi dang lam dang 'bras bu dang// sangs rgyas sems can la sogs pa// ma lus 'dus pa'i ngo bo nyid// phyi nang snod bcud ma lus pa// nam mkha'i ngang du 'dus pa ltar// snang stong rig pa'i chos rnams kun// rang byung rgyal por gdod nas gcig/ thog mtha' med pa'i rang bzhin ni// chos rnams kun gyi rang bzhin te// nam mkha'i mtha' dang mnyam sbyor bas// rdo rje snying po'i ngo bor gnas// nam mkha' rang bzhin dwangs pa la// ji snyed pa yi chos snang ba// rim pa ma 'dres gnas gyur kyang// de yi ngo bor gcig pa ltar// ma lus chos rnams mtha' yas pa// sems nyid ma skyes ngo bor gcig/ ma bcos gnas pa'i rang bzhin la// gang zhig rjes su spyad pa'i chos// sgra dang tshad ma gtan tshigs dang// bcos ma'i sbyor ba mtha' yas pa// brgyud pa'i sgo nas bstan pa kun// bskal pa gang+gA'i bye snyed du// bsgrubs shing btsal bas mi rnyed pa'i// rtog pa'i rnal 'byor la sogs pa'i// thabs la mi gnas bltos mi byed// gang gis bshad pa de dag kun// sangs rgyas mngon sum byin rlabs kyis// gzhan la ma bstan ma brgyud par// spyi blugs tshangs pa'i dbang gis bstan// ma lus thabs chen gcig tu bstan// skal ldan las kyis phrad pa la// dgongs pa byin rlabs tshul gyis bstan// rig pa'i nyams la chags pa na// sems dang nyams kyis gsal bar shes// mos ldan phrad par dka' ba la// rnam brgyud 'phrul tshig sgo nas bstan// skal med las kyis bsgribs pa la// thabs kyi khyad par gang bstan yang// thams cad la ni me long ltar// bltas kyang gzugs brnyan mi snang ngo// thabs kyi khyad par ci bstan pa// go zhing rtogs pa gcig las med// rgya mtsho chu bo ji bzhin no// dngos don thabs kyis gang rtogs nas// rig pa dang po'i gdeng ldan pa// phyi nang spyod yul ma lus la// rig dang dran pas gang gsal ba// rin chen gling la phyin pa'am// 'bru bcud nyams su myong ba'am// 'khrul pa gsal ba'i shes pa ltar// rig pa gcig tu nyams myong ba// re dogs rnam par bcad pa'i sems// phyogs bral ye shes chen por rgyas// ma bcos so mar nyag gcig pas// dus gsum 'byed pa'i chos med de// snga phyi med pa'i ngo bor gcig/ rtogs pa'i ye shes yengs pa med// chu bo'i rlabs sam kha dog gam// chu bo chu bur ji bzhin du// zhag dang zla ba nas bzung nas// bskal pa bye ba mtha' klas par// rgya mtsho rlan gyi ngo bo

ltar// ma sgoms ngo bo nyid du gnas// lta spyod ting 'dzin ro gcig pas// nam mkha' lta bur dpag med cing// stong chen rnam pa kun ldan pa// byin rlabs nus mthu'i gzhir gyur pa// dus gsum sangs rgyas kun gyi dngos// chos sku 'bras bu kun gyi gnas// rang byung snying po ma yin pa'i// dngos po gang yang med pas na// de nyid mngon du bstan pa dang// rgyu 'bras gnyis 'dzin la zhen pa'i// dngos 'dzin de nyid dgrol ba dang// skal ldan rigs can gang zag rnams// ma bcos sa la gzhag pa'i phyir// klong dgu'i rtsa ba gcig tu bstan// de nyid nam mkha'i rang bzhin ltar// dngos dang dngos med rnam par spangs// thig le chen po kun rdzogs pas// 'dus 'phro thig le klong du gsol// zhes gsungs so// nam mkha'i mtha' dang mnyam pa'i rgyud chen po las// klong dgu'i rtsa ba gcig tu bshad pa'i le'u ste lnga bcu pa'o//// de nas sems dpa' rdo rje dam pa la// 'dus pa chen po'i 'khor rang snang sprul pa'i tshogs kyis 'di skad ces gsol to// dus gsum rgyal ba'i rang bzhin khyod// sangs rgyas kun gyi bstan pa'i gter// rin chen klong dgu sems kyi bdag/ mgon po khyod la gsol ba ni// ma bcos rdo rje snying po'i rgyud// brjod pa tshig gi lde mig gis// ma bcos snying por ji ltar rtogs// bshad pa'i tshul ni bdag la gsungs// zhes gsol to// de nas sems dpa' rdo rje dam pa des 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// dus gsum rgyal ba thams cad kyi// sku gsung thugs ni gsang ba'i gter// nam mkha' mtha' dang mnyam pa'i rgyud// rdo rje snying po gsang ba'i lung// rang byung snying po dbyer med na// ma lus ston pa shes bya'i phyir// ma bcos gzhi dang dam pa'i lam// lhun gyis grub pa'i lam du bstan// ma bcos rdo rje snying po'i rgyud// nam mkha'i mtha' dang mnyam sbyor ba'i// sangs rgyas sems can dbyer med pa// lhan cig gnas pa'i nus pa dang// gdod nas lhun gyis rdzogs par gnas// rin chen lam gyi goms bya ba// srog chags phyogs med bgrod pa ltar// log pa'i lta spyod cir snang yang// nyam nga log pa'i 'du shes med// brjod pa tshig lam la brten nas// don dam rtogs pa 'byung bar 'gyur// dang por brda don sprad pa dang// gnyis pa don la phrad pa yin// gsum pa don dang bral ba yin// bzhi pa ma bcos lung du 'jug/ dang po gtan la 'bebs pa'i dus// gnyis pa gtan la phebs pa'i dus// gsum pa nges pa rnyed pa'i dus// bzhi pa gdeng du gyur pa'o// pra khrid sgra yi man ngag dang// nges pa gdeng gi man ngag dang// rig pa thal phyung man ngag dang// ye shes klong gi rim par bstan// ye

shes rgya mtsho bsam bral ba// yengs dang ma yengs 'du shes med// re dogs spangs pa'i bsam pa nyid// nam mkha'i mtha' dang mnyam par 'jug/ dang por mos pa tshogs spyod de// gnyis pa nam mkha' rdo rje nyid// gsum pa 'gro 'dul thabs su 'dod// sdug bsngal rtsol sgrub bcas pa yi// bsam gyis mi khyab dus su bstan// bde ba chen pos nyams su blang// dang por mos pas 'jug pa ste// gnyis pa rtog pa'i tshul gyis 'jug/ gsum pa gdeng du gyur pa'o// dang por rig can gang zag de// gnyis pa rtogs pa'i gang zag yin// gsum pa mthar phyin gang zag go/ dang po rang rgyud 'du shes can// gnyis pa dran snang glo bur ba// gsum pa ma bcos nyid du gsal// dang por mi mkhas shes pa ste// gnyis pa mkhas pa'i 'du shes yin// gsum pa ma bcos nyid du bstan// dang por dge ba dang du blang// gnyis pa gnyis ka mi len te// gsum pa dge sdig gnyis ka spyod// dang por rtse gcig dgongs pa ste// gnyis pa rtogs pa 'i dgongs pa yin// gsum pa phyogs ris med pa bstan// ma lus dran rtogs ting 'dzin mchog/ snang ba ma lus rig pa'i nyams// ma bgrod rig pa klong gi sa// dus gcig sangs rgyas sa la bkod// ma btsal lhun gyis grub pa nyid// rgyu rkyen brtsol ba las 'das pa// rang byung 'od dang rin chen ltar// gzan las byung dang bsgrubs pa dang// btsal dang bgrod pa'i 'bras bu min// rgya mtsho chu dang rba rlabs ltar// sna tshogs snang yang gzhan byung min// rang byung lhun rdzogs 'bras bu la// bdag gzhan don kun rdzogs par gnas// ngo bo gcig las ma g.yos kyang// rol pa gzhan don 'bum phrag yas// gang ltar mthun pa'i bsam pa ltar// mdzad pa'i byin rlabs 'od ltar 'phro// ma bcos rdzogs chen bstan pa 'di// rna brgyud tshad ma'i don bral zhing// ma bcos don gyi gdeng med na// lung dang sgra dang yid spyod kyis// rgya mtsho 'jings kyi pha bong ltar// rang snang rtogs pa'i nyams med par// gzhan don mdzad pa'i skyes bu des// pha rol ji ltar thar bar 'gyur// gnyis ka sbrel ma g.yang 'gril ltar// 'khor ba'i mtha' mar lhung gyur nas// re dogs gnas las thar pa med// ces gsungs so// nam mkha'i mtha' dang mnyam pa'i rgyud chen po las// don rnam grangs kyis gtan la pab pa'i le'u ste nga gcig pa'o//// de nas sems dpa' rdo rje dam pa la/ 'dus pa chen po rig pa rang snang gi 'khor tshogs kyis 'di skad ces gsol to// dus gsum rgyal ba thams cad kyi// sku gsung thugs kyi dgongs pa che// nam mkha'i mtha' dang mnyam pa'i rgyud// rtsa ba'i snying po las gsungs pa// man ngag dgu

rum sbas pa'i gter// thabs chen gang gis gsal bar bgyi// legs par bdag la bshad du gsol// zhes gsol to// de nas yang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba'i bdag po lag na rdo rjes 'di skad ces gsungs so// sangs rgyas kun gyi gsang ba'i gter// rig pa'i 'khor lo yu ba can// rtogs pa ye shes 'khor lo'i mdzod// don gyi snying po gsung gi bcud// kun brjod ye shes 'khor lo can// rang bzhin brtags dang ltos pa yi// ma rig mun pas bsgribs pa rnams// gsang ba'i rgyud 'di la brten nas// da lta nyid du dngas par byed// bskal pa stong phrag grangs med par// thabs kyi rtsol ba'i rnam grangs kyis// ji ltar btsal yang mi rnyed de// rang byung snying po rtogs par dka'// e maho rab tu rtogs par dka'// e maho rang bzhin rnyog pa med// e maho ma bcos bde chen po// e maho thig le rang byung sems// rdo rje snying po rmad byung ba// nam mkha'i mtha' dang mnyam pa'i rgyud// man ngag mngon du phyung ba ni// gang du rtsa ba snying po'i phyir// dang po dag ni bstan pa yin// de nyid rgyas par ston pa'i phyir// bcu pa gsal bar bkod pa yin// de dag tshogs pa'i dgos pa yang// byin rlabs ting 'dzin rig pa yis// rig pa rang 'char bstan mdzad pas// gnyis pa nyid ni bshad pa yin// brgyud pa'i gsang nyid bstan pa'i phyir// bzhi pa de ltar bkod pa yin// de dag skal ldan la bstan phyir// nyi shu drug pa bkod pa yin// 'di dag gzhi nyid bstan pa yin// skal ldan rigs can rnal 'byor pa// gsang ba'i don la gang gnas pa// legs nyes 'bras bu lung bstan phyir// nyi shu pa nyid bstan pa yin/ de nyid dkyil 'khor 'jug pa'i phyir// bcu gsum pa nyid bstan pa yin// dam tshig chen po dpog pa'i phyir// bco lnga pa nyid bstan pa yin// de dag nyid la dbang bskur zhing// bcu bzhi pa nyid bstan pa yin// skal ldan dbang thob gang zag gis// rna brgyud gdams pa thob dgos pas// bdun pa legs par bkod pa ste// lam gyi ngo bo bstan pa yin// bdag don rtogs pa mthar byin kyang// rdzogs pa tshig gi yan lag gis// bshad bya mdzod dgu'i bstan pa dag/ gang zag de la bstan pa'i phyir// lnga pa dag ni bshad pa yin// sems nyid mdzod dgu gter gyi bdag klong dgur phye ste bstan pa'i phyir// nyi shu gcig pa bkod pa yin// klong dgu'i bam po nyi khri yi// brjod pa'i lde mig bstan pa'i phyir// gsum pa nyid ni bkod pa yin// de dag nges pa'i gsal rtogs pas// drug pa nyid ni bkod pa yin// gdams ngag med pa'i gang zag la// gang gis gang la bsgribs pa'i phyir// dgu pa legs par

bkod pa yin// de nyid ma bcos bstan rtogs pas// brgyad pa legs par bstan pa yin// de nyid dbang po'i khyad par gyis// ji ltar 'tsham par bstan pa'i phyir// nyi shu lnga pa bstan pa yin// de yis yid ches nges pa'i phyir// nyi shu gsum pa bstan pa yin// nges pa rnyed pas klong dgu pa'o// rig pa gcig tu rtogs pa'i phyir// nyi shu gnyis pa bstan pa yin// rig pa skye med nyams myong pas// bcu gcig pa nyid bstan pa yin// de nyid bar chad med bsgom pa// bcu drug pa nyid gsal bar bstan// gdeng du gyur pa'i rnal 'byor pas// sgo gsum spyod pa bstan pa'i phyir// bcu gnyis pa nyid bstan pa yin// lta spyod ting 'dzin 'brel goms pas// bya med 'phrin las lhun grub pas// bcu bdun pa nyid bstan pa yin// de ltar rtogs goms rnal 'byor la// sa dang lam la rim med pas// bco brgyad pa nyid bstan pa yin// 'di dag yan lag bshad pa yin// de ltar sa lam mthar phyin pas// ye shes lnga rdzogs lhun rdzogs pas// bcu dgu pa nyid bstan pa yin// de nyid lhun grub 'bras bu brjod// de ltar rdzogs pa chen po nyid// mtshan gyi don nyid shes bya'i phyir// nyi shu bzhi pa gsal bar bstan// de dag mi nub bstan bya'i phyir// nyi shu bdun pa bstan pa yin// rang byung rdzogs pa'i bdud rtsi 'di// rna brgyud 'phrul tshig mi ldan par// rang brtags log pa'i 'du shes kyis// yid spyod rdzogs su gang 'jug pa// bla ma slob mar bcas pa rnams// bdud rtsi dug tu gyur pa ltar// lta spyod log pa'i nga rgyal gyis// rdo rje'i khab tu ltung gyur nas// byang chub sems kyi rigs dang bral// zhes gsungs so// nam mkha'i mtha' dang mnyam pa'i rgyud chen po las// rdo rje snying po'i rgyud man ngag gis gtan la phab pa'i le'u ste nga gnyis pa'o//// de nas yang sems dpa' rdo rje dam pa la// 'dus pa chen po'i tshogs rnams kyis mgrin gcig tu 'di skad ces gsol to// dus gsum rgyal ba thams cad kyi// snying po rang byung rgyal po la// skye shi re dogs mi gnas kyang// thugs rje'i mnga' bdag khyod kyis ni// 'chi bdag ye shes la bzlas te// 'gro bar re dogs gcod par mdzod// ces zhus so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba'i bdag po des 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rang byung rig pa'i rgyal po nyid// ma lus kun gyi rang bzhin yang// de nyid kun bzang rig pa ste// thog ma mtha' ma dngos med pas// de nyid bde ba chen po la// dran rtog bde sdug cir snang yang// ma bcos bdud rtsi'i thig ler brtag/ rang byung bdud rtsi'i pho brang nas// gsang ba'i thig le 'du zhing 'phro// rtsa ba ma skyes a las

byung// rtse mo phyogs med nam mkha'i klong// ngo bo thig le mi g.yo ba// brtags pas stong pa'i ngang du thim// gnas pa dang ni rgyu ba dang// thim par rang byung bde chen gsal// ma lus bdud rtsi thig le yis// 'chi ba'i re dogs gcad pa yin// bdud rtsi rgyu ba'i rig pa nyid// gang la brten pa'i ye shes te// phyi nang phyogs ris kha dog dbyibs// bar ma'i rig pa brtags pa las// nam mkha'i dkyil 'khor mngon du snang// dang po'i dkyil 'khor phyogs med la// gsang ba'i dbang pos bltas pa ltar// dang por mig dang phrad par bya// de nas mthong ba'i don la brtag/ rig pa gdeng gi don thob nas// ma lus kun kyang de bzhin te// phyogs med nam mkha'i rang bzhin la// skyes bus ral gri btab pa'am// dad pa'i rang bzhin 'bigs pa ltar// blun po rtog pas bcings 'gyur gyi// de nyid mthong ba'i rnal 'byor la// 'pho ba'i re dogs gcad pa yin// gang du de dag brtan gyur na// rig pa rgyu ba gnyis med pa// smig sgyu rlung dang 'dres pa ltar// de nyid rig pa'i stobs kyis bsgom// de ltar gsal brtan 'jigs bral na// snga phyi skye gnas 'jigs pa med// nam mkha' bsgribs med dngas pa la// gsal ba 'char nub med pa ltar// rang bzhin ma skyes phyogs med la// rig pa 'char nub med par brdal// nam zhig bslu bar 'dod pa na// rgyu ba rig pa'i thig le nyid// gnas pa a yi ngang la bstim// rlung sems nam mkha'i nyams myong gis// bsdus te nam mkha'i glong la thim// dang po rgyu ba'i thig le ste// gnyis pa rig pa'i thig le ste// gsum pa gnyis med thig le nyid// ma 'phos bar du nges par bya// gang du dman pa'i rnal 'byor la// 'chi bdag dbang po bzlog pa'i phyir// bsam gtan gsum gyi rnal 'byor gyi// 'chi ba'i re dogs rnam par gcad// thig le bsdu ba'i ngo bo ni// ji snyed bya ba'i spyod pa ni// bdag nyid spyi yi tshul du sdud// de nyid gnas pa 'byung bzhi rlung// 'di dag dus ni gsum yin la// mngon du nges shes mi skye la// bla mas byin gyis ma brlabs na// thug phrad lam la rmongs pa dang// 'chi med bdud rtsi don mi rtogs// dus gsum rig pas nges mthong la// rkyen dang ldan pa'i rnal 'byor pas// bar chad ma lus bsal byas te// snyan pa'i rol mor bcas pa yis// don dang ldan pa'i sgra gsum gyis// thun tshad nyams dang mnyam sbyar nas// dran dal gsum gyi sgra yis bstan// tha ma nyin zhag bdun gyis te// re dogs chad pa nyams myong gis// bar ma srid pa'i chos med par// skye ba len pa'i sdug bsngal bral// 'khor ba'i re dogs rnam par chad// sdug bsngal zad nas bde klong 'khyil// zhes gsungs

so// nam mkha'i mtha' dang mnyam pa'i rgyud chen po las// srog ye shes kyi bdud rtsi nam mkhar thim pa'i le'u steng gsum pa'o//// de nas yang sems dpa' rdo rje dam pa la/ 'dus pa chen po'i tshogs kyis 'di skad ces gsol to// dus gsum rgyal ba thams cad kyi// rig pa gsung gi 'khor lo bdag/ brgyud pa gsum gyi gsang ba 'chang// mgon po khyod la gsol ba ni// ma lus sems su rang gnas kyang// rang rkyen
